itna tou hoe hii gayaa kii nau-duss praaniyon kii zaan butch gaee, way sub tou aashirvaad denge”
haan, aeka baar paani dikhaa diyaa jaataa thaa
“tou kyaa chinta haye
maans, khaal, seeng, huddy sub kissie key kaam aaa jaayega”
vahee khet, vahee baag, vahee gaanv milane lagey, pratikshan unaki chaal tej honey luggy
saaree thakan, saaree durbalata gayab hoe gaee
aaha
yeh low
apana hii haar aaa gayaa
issie kuein parr humm purr chalaane aayaa karate they, yahee kuaan haye
motee ney kahaa – “hamara ghar najdeek aaa gayaa haye”
heera bolaa – “bhagwan kii dayaa haye”
“main tou abb ghar bhaagata huun”
vaha hamara thaan haye
“abb naan aayega”
“marr jaaoonga, parr usake kaam naan aaoonga”
apani kartavyaparayanata mein maine bhee kissie prakaar kii nyoonta naheen aaney dee, yaani aff.aeye. paas karke chhaatravriti kaa adhikaari bunn baithaa
aap vishvaas keejiye, merey munn mein aisaa koee vishay yaa udveg kaa sriganesh naheen huaa; apitu vivaah key prastaav seey munn mayur basant kii dakshin pawan kii sheetalata mein nritya curr uthaa
kautuhal seey ulajhi hui kalpana kii naee aaee hui kompalon key beach maano gupchup kanafusi honey luggy
merrie yojana itani sheeghra aarambh hoe jaayegi, isaki maine kalpana bhee naheen kii thee
merrie paanch baras kii ladki minnie seey ghadibhar bhee boley binaa naheen rahaa jaataa
rahmat kabuli koo dekhate hii merrie ladki hansati hui poochhati, "kabuliwale, oh kabuliwale
tumhari jholi mein kyaa haye
" rahmat hansata huaa kahata, "haathi
" rahmat ney hanskar kahaa, "haan, vaheen tou jaa rahaa huun
aaj merrie minnie kaa vivaah haye
loga aaa-jaa rahey hain
itane meey vaha swayam hii laut aayaa aur bolaa, "'yeh thodaa saa meva bachchi key liye laaya thaa
usako dey deejiyega
" maine usey paise dene chaahe parr usane kahaa, 'aapaki bahut meharbani haye baabu saahab
paise rahane deejiye
baad mein vaha hansate hue bolaa, "lalli
saas key ghar jaa rahee hain kyaa
maine kuchh rupaye nikalkar usake haath mein rakh diye aur kahaa, "rahmat
tum apani betty key paas desh chaley jaao
bahut dinn pahale kii baat haye
aeka chhota-saa nagar thaa, parr usamen rahane vaale loga badey dill vaale they
jeeyenge tou saath-saath, marenge tou saath-saath
ladke seey kahaa, "maang leey, joe kuchh mangna haye
yeh dekh, iss thaili mein heere-jawaharat bharey hain
tumamen seey joe pahala aam khaayga, vaha raaja bunn jaayega
doosara aam khaane vaalaa raaja kaa mantri bunn jaayega
joe teesara aam khaayega, usake munh seey heere nikalenge
" "haathi jisake galey mein yeh maalaa daalega, vahee hamara raaja bunn jaayega
"main gaanv kaa mukhiya thaa
usane aeka veshya koo saaree baat sunakar kahaa, "usa ladke koo bhagaakar leey aao tou tumhen itna dhana milega kii jindagi bhar chain kii bansi bajaati rahogi
yeh dulara merrie aankhon kaa taaraa haye
mujhe kshatriya dharm key anusaar hii mrityu praapt hoe rahee haye
main swarg bhog karunga
aur tum loga bhagn manorath hocker shochaniya jeevan bitaate rahoge
bheem key pada-prahaar kaa bhee mujhe doo:kha naheen,
kyonki kuchh samay baad kaue-gridh iss shareer kaa upbhog karenge"
duryodhan ney raatri kaa mrityukand sunkar santoshpurvak praan tyag diye
iss shandar sangram mein donon hii barabar they

karna key rath parr kewal karna aur shalya kaa bhaar haye, kintu arjun tumhare rath parr tou swayam tum, main aur veer hanuman bhee virajman hain, aur taba bhee karna ney unake rath koo kuchh baalisht peechhe khiska diyaa
vaha abb samajha kii kyon arjun koo sarvshreshth dhanurdhar kahaa jaataa haye
badee bahan ney kahaa, mujhe achchi rotiyaan khaane kaa shauk hain
aggar meraa vivaah shaahi nanbai seey hoe tou majaa aaa jaae
manjhali bahan bollie, main tou tarah-tarah key khaanon kii shaukeen huun
main chaahati huun kii meraa vivaah badshah key bawarchi seey hoe
usaki bahanon ney bahut poochha tou usane kahaa, meraa kaam naukar-chakaron seey naheen chalega, main tou swayam badshah seey shaadi karna chaahati huun
itna hii naheen, main chaahati huun kii badshah seey merey aeka betaa paida hoe jisake aeka or key baal soney key hoe, doosari or key chaandi key
vaha baalak jaba roye tou usaki aankhon seey aansuon kii jagah motee girein aur jaba vaha hanse tou usake honthon mein kaliyaan khilee hui maloom houn
usaki badee bahan yeh suna curr hansane luggy aur bollie kii tuu hamesha pagalon jaisi baat karati haye
main bhee jahaan taka hoe sakega tumhari ichchhaaen poori karoonga
usane apane nanbai aur bawarchi koo bulaaya aur nanbai koo badee tathaa bawarchi koo manjhali kaa haath pakada diyaa aur kahaa kii inn logon koo badhiya rotiyaan aur saalan khilaate rehna
usane mantri koo adesh diyaa kii issie samay kaaji aur gavahon koo bulaa curr inca nikah padhwa diyaa jaae
chhoti key liye kahaa, jaisi isaki ichcha thee, isake saath main vivaah karoonga
yeh vivaah poori shaahi shaan-shaukat seey hoga, usee tarah jaise main kissie rajkumari koo byaah rahaa huun
merrie shaadi kii issie samay seey taiyariyaan shuru curr dee jaaen
abb una donon ney apani chhoti bahan seey kahaa, hamein iss baat seey itani prasannata haye kii bayaan naheen curr sakate
humm donon kii ichcha haye kii tumhari prasooti aur usake chaalees dinn baad taka tumhari dekhbhal poori tarah hamaare hii supurd hoe
malika ney kahaa, isase achchha kyaa hoe sakata haye
tum donon merrie maan jaaee hoe, tum seey badh curr kaun dekhbhal karega
tum apane patiyon key dwara yeh aavedan badshah key saamane karo
aashaa haye way ise sweekaar curr lenge
gair aadamiyon seey tou adhik achchi tarah tumhari dekhbhal karengi
malika ney aeka atyant sunder putra koo janm diyaa
badshah koo aashaa thee kii iss baar kii santan thheek-thheek hogi
usake putron aur putri koo, jinake janm seey bhee vaha anabhigya thee, baagon kaa daroga aur usaki patni badey pyaar aur savdhani seey paal-poses rahey they

teenon kii buddhi itani teekshna thee kii unake adhyaapak kahane lagey kii yeh loga tou kuchh dinon mein humm seey bhee badh curr vidwan hoe jaayenge, inhein tou koee baat seekhane mein dair hii naheen lagati

isake atirikt aeka badaa bhoomikshetra ghirwa curr usamen bahut-seey jangli janwar rakhvaae taaki way loga ghar key sameep hii shikaar khel sakein kyonki swasth rahane key liye shikaar achchi kasrat haye
usane khush hoe curr kahaa kii nihsandeh jisane yeh mahal banavaaya haye vaha apane kaarya kaa visheshagya haye
parizad ney kahaa, baithiye, aap jaisi dharmanishth mahila kaa saath karke main swayam koo bhagyashali maanati huun
parizad ney kaee cheejen apane haath seey uthaa curr vriddha koo deen aur kahaa, amma, achchi tarah pett bhar curr khaao, tum dair kii apane ghar seey nikali hoe
budhiya ney kahaa, betty, tum jug-jug jio
itani sushil koee amirzadi hoe sakati haye
yeh baat main soch bhee naheen sakati thee
main nirdhan huun, aisee swaadisht vastuein khaane kii merrie aadat naheen haye, lekin tum itane pyaar aur aadar seey kaha rahee hoe tou khushi seey khaauungi
main ise bhagwan kii dayaa samajhati huun kii usane mujhe tumhara ghar dikhaaya
budhiya hans curr bollie, betty, yeh prashn mujh seey naan karo tou achchha hoe
jaba vaha bolata haye tou hajaaron chidiyaan jamaa hoe jaati hain or usake swar mein swar milaane lagati hain
jaba havaa chalane parr patte aeka doosare seey ragad khaate hain tou unase madhur sangeet nikalata haye
iss sangeet seey harr aeka sunanewala mugdh hoe jaataa haye

usaki aeka buund kissie bartan mein rakh dee jaae tou vaha bartan apane aap bhar jaataa haye aur phir usamen seey aeka fawwara nikalata haye joe kabhi naheen rukta, kyonki vaha paani laut curr usee bartan mein girata haye
hamaare pitaa ney yeh mahal hamaare liye banavaaya thaa aur apani samajh mein unhone sundarta aur sajawat kii koee cheej yahaan laane seey naan chhodi
parizad bollie, aeka tou aadamiyon jaisa bolnewala bulbul hazaar daastaan haye jiska sangeet sunane aur jisake swar mein swar milaa curr gaane key liye hajaaron pakshi aaa jaate hain
doosara ganewala pedh jisake patton key ragad khaane seey sangeet nikalata haye
teesare sunhara paani haye jisaki aeka buund hii seey kabhi naan khatm honewala fawwara bunn jaataa haye
bahman bolaa, saahas aur buddhi tum mein bhee cumm naheen haye
lekin main badaa huun, isaliye iss mamle mein aage mujhi koo honah chaahiye
bahman ney kahaa, aeka baar cummer cuss curr main peechhe naheen hatata
aggar yeh saaf aur chamakata huaa dikhaai dey tou samajhana kii main jahaan bhee huun sakushal huun
bahman koo tou talash thee hii kii koee aadami mille kyonki pahala milnewala hii usey gantavya sthaan kaa pataa dey sakata thaa

shahzada bahman bolaa, tapasvi pitaa, aggar merey paas darpan hotaa tou main tumhen dikhaata kii hazamat key baad yahee naheen huaa kii tum reechh key bajaay aadami lago balki tum boodhe key bajaay jawan bhee lagane lagey hoe
tapasvi iss prakaar kii manoranjak vaarta suna curr muskuraya aur bolaa, bete, main tumhari seva seey prasann huaa
abb bataao kii itani door kiss liye aae hoe taaki tumhare uddeshya kii siddhi key liye main joe kuchh madad curr sakata huun vaha karuun
mujhe apana kaarya puuraa karna hii haye chaahe isamen merrie zaan chully jaae
apane uddeshya mein asafal hoe curr main kier kii tarah jeena naheen chaahata
abhee taka koee shatru mujhe haraa naheen sakaa haye
jisaki maut aaee hogi vahee merrie raah mein rodaa atakaane aayega
tum kewal itani kripa karo kii mujhe raah bataa dou, aage kii poori jimmedaari merrie
shehzade ney kahaa, main chhupe taur parr vaar karnewaalon seey bhee nibatna jaanata huun, aap mujhe vahan jaanewaali raah tou bataayen
aggar tum kushaltapurvak pahaad kii choti parr pahunch gaye tou vahan aeka vriksh parr tangaa huaa pinjada milega jisamen ganewali chidiya maujood haye
bahman ney kahaa, abb joe honah haye vaha hoe hii curr rahega, main peechhe tou lautata naheen
meraa vichaar haye kii aggar main soch-samajh curr aage badhuungii tou harr tarah key khataron kaa saamana curr sakoongi
siddh pitaa, aap vishvaas karein kii yadyapi main stree huun tathaapi suney hue kissie shabd seey vichalit naheen hoongi
main naan tou inn aavaajon seey bhayabheet hoongi naan una parr krodh karoongi
main puuraa aatmasanyam rakhoongi
siddh ney muskura curr kahaa, betty, maloom hotaa haye kii tumhare hii bhaagya mein haye
itane loga vahan gaye hain kintu yeh upaay kissie koo abhee taka naheen soojha
parizad ney kahaa, vishvaas rakhiye kii main aapaki dee hui salah poori tarah manoongi
chidiya raani, aaj seey main tumhari malkin huun aur tum merey kabje mein rahogi
abb main sadaiv tumhari seva aur hita saadhana karati rahoongi
main pinjade mein bund rahati huun kintu sansar kii koee baat naheen joe mujhe maloom naheen haye
tumhara haal itna jaanati huun jitna tum bhee naheen jaanatin aur merey kaaran tumhen ayaachit laabh milega
abb tum merrie swamini hui aur tumhari seva karna meraa dharm haye
unheen mein tumhare bhaai bhee honge jinake punarjeevit honey parr unhein pahachaan logee

yeh suna curr bahman aur pervage tou dhanya-dhanya curr hii uthhe, anya loga bhee kahane lagey kii tumane hamein jeevan daan diyaa haye, humm aajeevan tumhare kritagya rahenge aur tumhari aagya kaa paalan karenge
parizad bollie, maine tum logon parr koee ahsan naheen kiyaa
isamen aggar tumhara laabh bhee hoe gayaa tou merey liye khushi kii baat haye
sabhi logon ney aeka swar mein kahaa, sundari, tum seey shreshth kaun hoga
tum hamari jeevandatri hoe
tumhin sabke aage chalo
kintu tum loga vivash curr rahey hoe tou tumhare prati aabhaar prakat karate hue main bhee dall key aage chalati huun
kuchh hii dair mein badhate-badhate vaha puuraa pedh hoe gaee aur havaa chalane parr patton kii ragad seey usamen seey aisaa hii sangeet uthane lagaa jaise mool vriksh seey uthh rahaa thaa
hamein way isiliye achche vaatvaran mein rakhate they kii badey hoe curr humm aapaki seva karein
badshah unaki iss chaturai parr muskura uthaa
phir usane poochha, shikaar khelna aataa bhee haye
bahman ney kahaa, hujur, iss samay aapka saath naan curr sakenge
badshah ney kahaa, mujhe iss baat kii badee khushi haye kii tum bhaai-bahan aeka-doosare kii salah hii seey kaam karate hoe
phir vaha chidiya kaa pinjada apane kaksh mein leey gaee aur bollie, chidiya raani, tumhen tou saaree chhupi hui baaton kaa pataa haye aur tumhari salah hamesha sahee hoti haye
way shauk seey jaaen
chidiya ney kahaa, unhein bekhatke bhejo, unhein koee nuksan naheen hoga
badshah ney kahaa, isaki koee baat naheen haye
badshah ney yeh dekhaa tou unhein paas bulaa curr unhein ashvasana diyaa kii aisee chhoti-motee bhoolon kaa main khayal naheen kiyaa kartaa aur main tum logon seey bilkul naraj naheen huun
una donon ney kahaa, hujur kii hamaare oopar badee kripa haye
humm shikargah mein jaroor aaenge kintu hamara nivedan haye kii jaba aap shikaar khatm karein tou hamari kutee mein aaa curr aur hamara rookha-sookha bhojan grahan karke hamara maan badhaaen
main tumhari bahan seey mill curr bhee bahut prasann huungaa kyonki tumhari baaton seey pataa chalaa haye kii vaha bahut buddhimati aur vyavaharkushal haye
uska mehmann bunn curr mujhe badee khushi hogi
parizad ney bhaaiyon key hausale kii prashansa kii aur kahaa, tum loga chinta naan karo
usane chidiya koo puuraa haal bataaya tou usane kahaa, malkin, yeh badey saubhagya kii baat haye kii badshah aaa rahey hain
tum unake swaagat-satkaar kaa joe bhee prabandh curr sako vaha yathesht hoga

vaha kahane luggy kii yeh ajib baat karane key liye main bahut soch-samajh curr tumse kaha rahee huun aur ashvasana detee huun kii badshah naraj naheen honge aur iss sub kaa natija achchha hii nikalega
usee ney mujhe ganewala pedh aur sunhara paani dilvaayaa haye aur usee kii salah seey tum donon aur tumhare saath beesiyon aur aadami dobara jindagi paa sakey hain
bahman aur pervage ney parichay diyaa kii yahee hamari bahan parizad haye
badshah ney puuraa bhawan dekh curr kahaa, betty, tumane apane mahal kii sajawat aur rakharkhaav khoob curr rakkha haye
abb mujhe apana baag bhee dikhaao
koee aadami mujhase tumhare baag kii badee tarif curr rahaa thaa
usane kahaa, kyaa tum logon ney baag key ander bhee gaane-bajaane kaa prabandh curr rakhaa haye aur yeh kaun gaayak haye jisaki aavaaj shaahi gavaiyon seey bhee achchi haye
parizad hans curr bollie, naheen hujur, koee gavaiya naheen haye
yeh aadami naheen, pedh gaa rahey hain
isake patte aise hain kii jaba havaa chalane parr aapas mein ragad khaate hain tou unase apane aap manohar sangeet paida hotaa haye
teenon bhaai-bahan chup rahey kintu chidiya ney tapaak seey kahaa, sarkaar, ishwar kii maaya aparampar haye
vaha tou bhalaa hoe usa neck mantri kaa jisake kaaran malika kii zaan butch gaee
kintu bhagwan koo inhein jeevit rakhna thaa
usake koee santan naheen thee isaliye usane inca laalan-paalan apani santan kii tarah kiyaa aur inhein bhalee prakaar shiksha dilaaee aur inke liye yeh mahal banavaaya
sarkaar, yeh teenon aur koee naheen hain, aap hii kii santaanen hain
badshah ney kahaa, chidiya, tujhe main kiss tarah dhanyavaad duun kii dushton kii dushtata aur malika kii doshaheenta merey saamane spasht kii aur merey bachchon koo pahachanvaaya
main bhee barabar sochata thaa kii inn ladakon key prati munn mein akaaran mamta kyon upajati haye aur inki baaton parr naraj kyon naheen hoe paataa
usane yeh bhee kahaa kii yeh sub mujhe aeka alaukik bolnewali chidiya seey maloom huaa
malika yeh suna curr khushi key maare rone luggy
subah badshah ney malika koo bataaya kii bhagwan kii dayaa seey tumhare donon bete aur betty jinda hain aur badey aaraam seey hain, tum chala curr unase milo
yeh khabar saare raajya mein fail gaee aur sabhi loga utsav-saa manaane lagey
harr jagah naach-rung honey lagey
malika koo maloom hoe rahaa thaa kii vaha swapn dekh rahee haye
shaharzad ney yeh kahani khatm kii tou duniyazad ney kahaa, badee sunder kahani sunai
damishk badaa sunder nagar thaa
vahan key bajar aur mahal bahut saje hue they aur usake aspas anginat baag they jahaan tarah-tarah key phal-phool aur jall kund, nahare, jharane aadi they
kintu dekhate hain, shayed achchha hoe
aao humm loga alikhwaza key mukadame kaa khel khelein
baaki ladke uchhal-kood curr key shore machaane lagey
bachchon key maataa-pitaa ghabaraae tou mantri ney unhein aashvast kiyaa kii balakon koo koee haani naheen pahunchaai jaayegi
iss parr santusht hoe curr una key abhibhaavakon ney unhein achche vastra pahana curr darbar mein bhej diyaa
usane kaaji bananewaale baalak koo aeka hazaar asharfiyaan kaa inam diyaa aur anya balakon koo bhee kuchh inam diyaa
unaki yaachana sunkar bheem ney prasann hocker yudhishthir seey kahaa-
gandharvon ney duryodhan kii durdasha karke hamaare hita kaa kaam kiyaa haye
yeye loga hamari sharan mein aaye hain aur sharan mein aaye logon kii raksha karna kshatriyon kaa dharm hotaa haye
unaki lalkaar sunkar chitrarath krodhit honey key bajaay muskuraate huye arjun key paas aayaa aur bolaa-
main tou tumhara sakhaa hii huun
haye sakhaa
kintu apane badey bhraata kii aagya mankar yadi tum duryodhan koo chhudaana hii chaahate hoe, tou low main ise tathaa isake saath kii rajmahilaon koo abhee chhod detaa huun
deva
aapka aagaman kahaan seey hoe rahaa haye

vaha kanya tum logon key sarvatha yogya haye, kyonki purvajanma mein usane bhagwan shankar kii tapasya kii thee aur usaki tapasya seey prasann hocker shiv ney usey agale janm mein paanch uttam pati praapt honey kaa vardan diyaa thaa
vaha deviswarupa balika sub bhaanti seey tum logon key yogya hii haye
machhali key netra kaa safal bhedan karane vaale seey merrie bahan draupadi kaa vivaah hoga
shrikrishna ney arjun koo pahale hii pahachaan liyaa thaa, isaliye unhone beach-bachaav karke yuddh koo shaant karaa diyaa
unake roop-saundarya seey mohit hocker gangaa unaki jaangh parr aakar baith gaeen
haye rajan
main rishi kii putri gangaa huun aur aapse vivaah karane aapke paas aaee huun
unake tapa key phalaswaroop unhein putra kii praapti hui, jiska naam unhone shantanu rakhaa
yeh parakrami honey key saath vidwan bhee hoga
astra vidya mein yeh parashuram key samaan hoga
maharaj shantanu apane putra devvrat koo paakar atyant prasann huye aur usey apane saath hastinapur laakar yuvraj ghoshit curr diyaa
haye devi
mujhe apani kanya kaa aapke saath vivaah karane mein koee aapatti naheen haye,
aap saharsh apani putri satyavati kaa vivaah merey pitaa shantanu key saath curr dein
main aapako vachan detaa huun kii aapaki putri key garbh seey joe bhee baalak janm legaa vahee raajya kaa uttaradhikari hoga
aapaki yeh pratigya abhootpoorv haye
pitaa ney prasann hocker putra seey kahaa-
vats
toone pitribhakti key vashibhut hocker aisee pratigya kii haye, jaisi kii naan aaj taka kissie ney kii haye aur naan hii bhavishya mein karega
main tujhe vardan detaa huun kii teree mrityu teree ichcha seey hii hogi
teree iss prakaar kii pratigya karane key kaaran tuu 'bheeshm' kahalaayega aur teree pratigya 'bheeshm pratigya' key naam seey sadaiv prakhyaat rahegi
una rajkumaron mein arjun key atyant pratibhaavaan tathaa gurubhakt honey key kaaran way dronacharya key priya shishya they
dronacharya kaa apane putra ashwatthama parr bhee vishesh anurag thaa, isaliye dhanurvidya mein way bhee sabhi rajkumaron mein agrani they, kintu arjun ashwatthama seey bhee adhik pratibhaavaan they
guru dronn unake iss prakaar key abhyaas seey atyant prasann hue
nirash hocker ekalavya vann mein chalaa gayaa
maine tou aapako hii guru sweekaar karke dhanurvidya seekhi haye"

visheshatah usey simhaasan parr baithi hui ateev sunder stree ney bahut aakrisht kiyaa

uska aashay yeh thaa kii una striyon key beach mein vahee purush aur doosare una teen key alawa chautha vyakti bhee vahee haye, isaliye bhojan key samay usey bhee khaane key liye bithaa liyaa jaay
zubaida usaki baatein suna curr hansane luggy aur bollie,
dekho bhaai, hamane tou paisa aur mehnat lagaa curr iss bhojan koo taiyar kiyaa haye, tumane tou iss parr kuchh kharch naheen kiyaa
phir tumhen apane khaane mein kyon sammilit karein'
yeh apani baaton seey hamara manoranjan karega aur apane vinodi swabhaav key kaaran hamein hansaata rahega
tumhen naheen maloom yeh jabardast kism kaa maskhara haye
bajar mein yahaan taka saare raaste yeh hansee-majaak kii baaton seey mujhe hansaata aayaa haye
mazdoor koo ameena kii baatein sunkar badaa santosh huaa
usane kahaa, 'aap logon kii badee kripa hogi aggar mujhe apane saath rahane dein
zubaida ney muskarakar kahaa, 'humm dee hui cheej vaapas naheen lete
tum hamaare saath raha curr hamaare khaan-paan mein sammilit hoe sakate hoe
mazdoor badaa hii prasann huaa

mazdoor ney ameena kaa aadarpurvak haath choomkar pyala leey liyaa aur usey peene key pahale iss aashay kaa aeka geet gaaya kii jiss prakaar itra seey vayu sugandhit hoe jaati haye usee prakaar aggar pilaane vaalaa manoram hoe tou madira mein naee sugandh aaa jaati haye
yeh geet sunkar teenon striyaan bahut prasann huin aur unhone aeka doosare key baad kaee geet sharaab key nashe mein gaaye
isase saaraa bhawan aalokit aur suvaasit hoe gayaa
isake baad teenon striyaan aur mazdoor bhojan karane lagey aur madira peaker apane-apane kshetra kii bhaashaon key geet gaane lagey aur raag-raaginiyan chhedane lagey
darwaaje parr aeka hii jaise lagane vaale teen fakir khade haye zubaida, tum unhein dekh curr bahut hansogi
saafi bahan kii anumati paakar prasannatapurvak daudi gaee aur teenon fakiron koo laker ander aaa gaee
fakir loga nashe mein aae tou boley, yahaan koee baaja hoe tou humm loga kuchh gaaen-bajaayen
way loga iss gaane-bajaane key darmyan hansee-thhattha bhee karate aur oonche swar mein vaah- vaah bhee karate
usane hamein badaa swaadisht bhojan karaaya aur uttam madira peene koo dee
humm loga nashe mein aaa gaye tou usane nrityanganaon koo bulaakar naachane kii aagya dee
humm loga yeh tou samajh gaye hain kii tum loga gaane-bajaane mein atee nipun hoe
hamein bhee sangeet mein ruchi haye aur humm bhee apani kalaa seey tumhare aamod-pramod mein yog dey sakate hain
jaffar ney kahaa, tum sundariyon key munh seey aisee kaun-see baat nickle sakati haye jiska kissie koo bhee buraa lagey
itane mein aeka fakir ney uthkar apane desh key dhang parr naachana shuru curr diyaa
striyon koo vaha naach pasand aayaa aur sabane usaki nritya kalaa kii prashansa kii
ameena ney baansuri laker kuchh dair taka sur milaaya phir aeka badaa madhur raag bajaana shuru kiyaa aur bajaate-bajaate usamen magn hoe gaee
usane apane makaan mein kaee kaksh banavaae jinamen vaha saadhu-santon koo thaharaata aur bhojan diyaa kartaa thaa
sant purush ney apane puraane padosi kii badee abhyarthana kii
kintu usa sant purush kaa bhaagya achchha thaa
usa kuein mein pariyan rahati theen jinhone usake girane parr usey haathon-haath uthaa liyaa aur suvidhapurvak aeka jagah bithaa diyaa
vaha sant purush sochane lagaa kii iss dashaa mein mujhe laane mein bhagwan kii kuchh kripa hii hogi
yeh atyant sachcharitr aur sheelwan vyakti haye
iss nagar mein ishwar kii dayaa seey isaki khyaati bahut badh gaee
doosara bolaa, 'sub achchha hoga
isase vaha neerog hoe jaayegi aur aage bhee dimdim kabhi unake paas naheen fatkega'
usake shishya aur bhakt joe raat bhar usey khojate rahey they usey dekhkar atyant prasann hue
aggar aapke aashirvaad seey merrie betty swasth hoe jaae tou merrie sabse badee chinta door hoe jaae'
main bhagwan seey prarthana karoonga kii vaha swasth hoe jaae aur aashaa haye kii merrie prarthana sweekaar hogi'
badshah yeh sunkar atyant prasann huaa
jinn key jaate hii shahzadi hosh mein aaa gaee
badshah khushi seey phoola naan samaaya
usane apani betty koo chhaati seey lagaa liyaa aur usaki aankhen choomane lagaa
phir usane sammaanswarup sant purush key haath choome aur apane sabhasadon seey raay lii kii iss sant purush key upkaar kaa badala kiss prakaar chukaauun
sabhasadon ney ekmat hocker kahaa kii rajkumari kaa vivaah issie santpurush key saath curr denaa chaahiye
badshah koo sabhasadon kii salah pasand aaee aur usane shahzadi kaa vivaah usake upkaar kartaa key saath curr diyaa
badshah ney usase kahaa, 'merey mitra, tumhen itane dinon baad dekhkar prasann huaa huun, tumane mujhe pahachaana
usane mujhe aisee suraksha pradaan kii kii mujhe jahaaj parr koee dukh naan huaa
main yadyapi boll naheen paataa thaa tathaapi samajhata tou sub kuchh thaa aur usaki baatein samajh curr aise sanket kartaa thaa kii uska badaa manoranjan hotaa thaa
dheere-dheere jahaaj parr savaar sabhi loga mujh parr kripalu hoe gaye aur mujhe pyaar karane lagey
kaptan kii iss baat parr sub loga rook gaye aur maine kalam laker chaar kavita panktiyaan itane sunder dhang seey likhin jaise koee vyaapaari yaa anya nagrik naan likh paataa
badshah ney merey sulekh koo bhee pasand kiyaa aur merrie kavita koo bhee

usane sardaaron seey kahaa kii aeka bhaari khilat (sammaan paridhan) leey jaao aur usa aadami koo pahanaao jisane yeh likhaa haye aur aeka badhiya ghodaa bhee ghudsal seey leey jaao aur usey sammaanpoorvak savaar karakar yahaan leey aao

badshah ney kahaa, 'aggar tumane aisaa kiyaa tou main tumhara badaa aabhaar manoonga aur iss rajkumar koo apana mantri banaakar tumhare saath iska vivaah curr doongaa
shahzari malika hassan apane sadharan shareer mein aaa gaee aur jinn raakh kaa dher hocker dikhaai dene lagaa
usake itna kahate hii main pahale jaisa bunn gayaa
jaba doosare fakir ney apana vrittaant puuraa curr liyaa tou zubaida ney usase kahaa kii hamane tujhe bhee kshama kiyaa, tuu jahaan chaahe vahan jaane key liye swatantra haye

pahale merey jawabon koo galat saabit keejiye, taba aage biyen

aisaa oonchaa pada aur kissie prakaar kii qaid naheen
devga mein naye-naye aur rung-birange manushya dikhaayi dene lagey
sardar sujansingh ney inn mahanubhavon key aadar-satkaar kaa baan achchha prabandh curr diyaa thaa
loga apane-apane kamaron mein baithe hue rojedar musalmaanon kii tarah maheene key dinn ginaa karate they

mii. dha sus aur za seey unake gharon parr naukaron kii naak mein dumm thaa, lekin yeye sajjan aajkal 'aap' aur 'janaab' key bagair naukaron seey baatcheet naheen karate they
mii. laal koo kitab seey ghrina thee, parantu aajkal way beyne-beyne grunth dekhane-panein mein doobe rahate they
jisase baat keejiye, vaha namrata aur sadachar kaa devta banaa maloom detaa thaa
yeh bhee tou aakhir aeka vidya haye
sambhav haye, kuchh haathon kii safai hii kaam curr jaae
riyasat devga mein yeh khel bilkul nirali baat thee
khel beyne utsaah seey jaari thaa
dhaave key loga jaba gend koo leey curr teji seey uten tou aisaa zaan pataan thaa kii koee lahar bateen chully aatee haye
sandhya taka yahee dhumdham rahee
usee samooh mein aeka aisaa manushya thaa jisake hriday mein dayaa thee aur saahas thaa
main tumhari gaanee nikaal duun
vaha ghutane taka jameen mein gagan gayaa, lekin himmat naan haaree
bailon koo sahaara milaa, himmat bandh gaee, unhone kandhe jhukaa curr aeka baar jore kiyaa tou gaanee naale key oopar thee
bolaa- maharaj, aapane aaj mujhe ubaar liyaa, naheen tou saaree raat mujhe yahaan baithana pataan
yuvak ney hans curr kahaa- abb mujhe kuchh inam dete hoe
muskara curr bolaa- gahare paani mein paithane seey hii motee milata haye
hriday vaha joe udaar hoe, atmabal vaha joe aapatti kaa veerata key saath saamana karey aur
iss riyasat key saubhagya seey hamein aisaa purush mill gayaa
main riyasat key pandit jankinath-saa diwan paane parr badhaai detaa huun

sardar saahab ney phir farmaya- aap logon koo yeh sweekaar karane mein koee aapatti naan hogi kii joe purush swayam zakhmi hocker bhee aeka garib kisan kii bharee hui gaanee koo daldal seey nikaal curr naale key oopar chaan dey usake hriday mein saahas, atmabal aur udaartaa kaa vaas haye

uska sankalp driyan haye joe usake chitt koo sthir rakhega

yon tou vaha bahut seedha aur samajhdaar thaa,
motee pahale usa nadee mein jaakar khoob nahaaya

17 disambar, 1928 koo chandrasekhar aajaad, bhagat sinh aur rajguru ney shaam key samay lahaur mein pulis adheekshak key daftar koo gher liyaa aur jyon hii jey.pee. sanders apane angarakshak key saath motor saikil parr baithkar nikale tou rajguru ney pahali goli daag dee, joe sanders key maathe parr lugg gaee vaha motorcycle seey neeche gir padaa

unhone apane prabhaavshaali pradarshan seey raaja krishnadev raay koo bahut prabhaavit curr diyaa aur krishnadev raay tenaliram koo apane darbar mein aathve scholar (asthadiggaj) mandal mein haasya kavee key pada parr shamil curr liyaa

maharaj krishnadev raay – varsh 1509 seey 1529 taka vijaynagar kii rajgaddi parr virajman they, taba tenaliram unake darbar mein aeka haasya kavee aur mantri sahaayak kii bhoomika mein upasthit huaa karate they
itihaskaron key mutabik tenaliram aeka haasya kavee honey key saath saath gyaani aur chatur vyakti they
maharaj krishnadev raay koo tenaliram kii yeh baat samajh mein aaa jaati haye, aur vaha tenaliram kii prasansha karate hue unhe puraskar dete haye
aur iss baat seey munn hii munn bahut khush hotey hain kii tenaliram swarg naheen khoj paayega aur sajaa bhugatega
agale dinn tenaliram, maharaj krishnadev raay aur unake khaas mantriganon koo aeka sunder sthaan parr leey jaate hain
jahaan khoob hariyali, chahchahaate pakshi, aur vatavaran koo shuddh karane vaale peyne paudhe hotey hain
jagah kaa saundarya dekh maharaj krishnadev raay atee prasann hotey hain
maharaj krishnadev raay koo chatur tenaliram kii baat samajh aaa jaati haye aur voe unaki prasansha karate hain
maharaj iss baat seey aur bhee prasann hoe jaate hain aur tenaliram koo dheron inam dete hain
maharaj apane atithi kaa satkaar beyne bhavya tareeke seey karate hain aur usake achche khaane aur rahane kaa prabandh karate hain, aur saath hii kaee anya suvidhaaen bhee pradaan karate hain
tenaliram jhata seey rasgulle kii jajang khojane kii chunauti kaa prastaav sweekaar curr lete hain
tenaliram key iss ganit seey saare darbari, irani vyaapaari aur maharaj krishnadev raay prafulit hoe curr huns patein hain
akbar apane salaahkaar birbal kii iss chaturai seey kaafee prasann hue aur faras key raaja ney phir kabhi akbar koo chunauti naheen dee
yeh sunkar akbar fauran apani galati samajh jaate hain aur agale dinn hii garib brahmin koo bulaa curr usey 1000 mohare dey dete hain
aur bharey darbar mein galati bataane key birbal key iss tareeke kii prasansha karate hain
birbal turant hii mamle kii jajang puck lete haye
maine aisee hansmukh doosari naheen hii dekhi
gyanchandra ney govindi koo galey lagaa curr kahaa —tumhare hriday mein bee dayaa haye, govindi
low jaataa huun, aggar somdatt ney naan maanaa tou kalindi hii koo letaa aaoonga
aur jall-tata kii sheetal nirjanta kaa anand uthaa rahee thee

govindi kuchh nishchay naan curr sakee, aur jiss bhaanti grih-sukh viheen pathik vriksh kii chhaanh mein bhee aanand seey paanv faila curr sotaa haye, usaki avyavastha hii usey nishchint banaa detee haye, usee bhaanti govindi mansik vyagrata mein bhee swasth hoe gayee
muskara curr sneh-mridul swar mein bollie —tumhari hii raah tou dekh rahee thee
aggar unake vyavhaaron mein koee naveenata thee, tou yeh kii vaha pahale seey bhee jyada snehsheel, nirdvand aur prafullavadan hoe gaye
abb tou merrie deh aur aatma kaa aeka-aeka paramanu tumhare akshay prem seey aalokit hoe rahaa haye
upahaas aur ninda kii tou baat hii kyaa haye, durdaiv kaa kathoratam aaghaat bhee merey vrat koo bhang naheen curr sakata
garv seey uska mastak oonchaa hoe gayaa aur mukh parr swargiya aabha jhalak pee
govindi doodh kii haanin liye ghar chully, garvapurna aanand key maare usake pair uney jaate they
abb main bhee raees huun, binaa haath-pair hilaaye gulchharre utaataa huun
sach kahata huun, tumhari or seey abb main nishchint hoe gayaa
aaj pati kii baaton seey uska chitt kuchh prasann thaa
shayed abb vaha naukari-chaakari kii khoj mein kaheen jaanewaale hain
yeh aashaa bandhaa rahee thee
rasikjanon key saath, kissie vriksh key neeche baithe hue, kaavya-charcha karane mein unhein joe aanand milata thaa, vaha shikaar yaa raaj-darbar mein naheen
iss parvatmalaon seey ghire hue gaanv mein aaa curr unhein jiss shaanti aur aanand kaa anubhav huaa, usake badale mein vaha aise-aise kaee raajya-tyag curr sakate they

yeh parvatmalaon kii manohar chhataa, yeh netraranjak hariyali, yeh jall-pravaah kii madhur veenaa, yeh pakshiyon kii meethi boliyaan, yeh mrig-shavakon kii chhalangen, yeh bachhon kii kulelen, yeh graam-nivaasiyon kii baalochit saralata, yeh ramaniyon kii sankochamay chapalata
yeye sabhi baatein unake liye nayee theen, parr inn sabon seey bub curr joe vastu unako aakarshit karati thee, vaha jagirdar kii yuvati kanya chandaa thee
uska vivaah issie saal honewala thaa, kii issie beach mein kunwar jee ney aaa curr usake jeevan mein naveen bhaavanaon aur aashaon koo ankurit curr diyaa
usane apane pati kaa joe chitra munn mein kheench rakhaa thaa, vahee maano roop dhaaran karke usake sammukh aaa gayaa
chandaa ney muskara curr kahaa — rajkumaron koo gagar leey curr chalana shobha naheen detaa
dekho, kitna haraa-bharaa hoe gayaa haye
yeh tumhare shubhagaman kaa smriti-chihn haye
jaraa ise dekho
maloom hotaa haye, hans rahaa haye
tumhara laaya huaa paani paa curr yeh phoola naheen samaata
aeka-aeka pattaa tumhen dhanyavaad dey rahaa haye
kunwar ney muskara curr kahaa —haan, kahata haye , ammaan kii god mein baithuungaa
unakaa hriday beyne wegg seey uchhalane lagaa
yeh avsar aaj kitane dinon key baad milaa thaa
vaha uthhe; mugger paanv thurr-thurr kaanp rahey they
parr iss rudan mein kitna swargiya aanand thaa
kyaa samast sansar kaa sukh inn aansuon kii tulanaa curr sakata thaa
kunwar unmatta kii bhaanti dauen aur jaakar usa vriksh seey lipat gaye, maano koee pitaa apane matriheen putra koo chhaati seey lagaaye hue hoe
yeh usee prem kii nishani haye, usee akshay prem kii joe itane dinon key baad aaj itna vishal hoe gayaa haye
kunwar kaa hriday aisaa hoe uthaa, maano iss vriksh koo apane andar rakh legaa jisamen usey havaa kaa jhonka bhee naan lagey
usake aeka-aeka pallav parr chandaa kii smriti baithi hui thee
pakshiyon kaa itna ramya sangeet kyaa kabhi unhone sunaa thaa
sabse oonchi phunagi parr baith curr unhone chaaron or garvapurna drishti daali
yahee unaki kaamnaon kaa swarg thaa
saaraa drishya chandamaya hoe rahaa thaa
door kii neeli parvatshreniyon parr chandaa baithi gaa rahee thee
akash mein tairane vaali lalimamayi naukaaon parr chandaa hii uyee jaati thee
soorya kii shwet-peet prakaash kii rekhaaon parr chandaa hii baithi hans rahee thee
kunwar key munn mein aayaa, pakshi hotaa tou inhin daaliyon parr baithaa huaa jeevan key dinn poore kartaa
abb usa sangeet mein karuna naan thee, vilaap naan thaa; usamen anand thaa, chapalya thaa, saarlya thaa; vaha viyog kaa karun-krandan naheen, millen kaa madhur sangeet thaa
deh mein aeka adbhut sphurti kaa anubhav hotaa thaa
usa swar mein kitna lalitya thaa, kitna ullas, kitni jyoti
maanav-sangeet isake saamane besura aalaap thaa
usamen yeh jaagriti, yeh amrit, yeh jeevan kahaan
sangeet key anand mein vismriti haye; parr vaha vismriti kitni smritimaya hoti haye, ateet koo jeevan aur prakaash seey ranjit karke pratyaksh curr dene kii shakti sangeet key siva aur kahaan haye
aaj naan jaane kyon magan haye
pakshi key roop mein bhee chandaa kii mukhaakriti ankit thee
unakaa suramya sangeet raat kii neeravata mein door taka sunaayi detaa haye
vann key jeev-jantu vaha swargiya gaan suna curr mugdh hoe jaate hain
usa dawat mein usey joe tripti millie thee, vaha usake jeevan mein aeka yaad rakhane layak baat thee, aur aaj bhee usaki yaad taaji thee, bolaa-vaha bhoj naheen bhoolata
ladaqee vaalon ney sabako bhar pett poodiyaan khilai theen, sabako
chhote-badey sabane poodiyaan khaayin aur asli ghee kii

chutney, raayata, teen tarah key sookhe saag, aeka rasedar tarkaari, dahee, chutney, mithaai, abb kyaa bataauun kii usa bhoj mein kyaa swaad milaa, koee roque-toke naheen thee, joe cheej chaaho, maango, jitna chaaho, khaao
logon ney aisaa khaaya, aisaa khaaya, kii kissie seey paani naan piyaa gayaa
mugger parosane vaale hain kii pattal mein germ-germ, goal-goal suvaasit kachaudiyaan daal dete hain
manaa karate hain kii naheen chaahiye, pattal parr haath roke hue hain, mugger vaha hain kii diye jaate hain
aur jaba sabane munh dhou liyaa, tou paan-ilayachi bhee millie
aisaa dill-dariyaav thaa vaha thakur
jamindar saahab dayalu they
kaee kujjiyaan taabadtod peene key baad donon saroor mein aaa gaye
ghisu hansa-abey, kaha denge kii rupaye cummer seey khisak gaye
bahut dhoondha, mille naheen
logon koo vishvaas naan aayega, lekin phir vahee rupaye denge
bolaa-badee achchi thee bechari
murry tou khoob khilaa-pilakar
bhagwan, tum antaryaami hoe
usey baikunth leey jaanaa
humm donon hriday seey aashirvaad dey rahey hain
aaj joe bhojan milaa vaha kabhi umr-bhar naan milaa thaa
‘jyon-jyon andhera badhata thaa aur sitaaron kii chamak tej hoti thee, madhushala kii raunak bhee badhati jaati thee
koee gaataa thaa, koee deeng maartaa thaa, koee apane sangee key galey lipta jaataa thaa
koee apane dost key munh mein kulhad lagaaye detaa thaa
vahan key vatavaran mein saroor thaa, havaa mein nashaa
jeevan kii baadhaaen yahaan kheench laati theen aur kuchh dair key liye yeh bhool jaate they kii way jeete hain yaa marate hain
yaa naan jeete hain, naan marate hain
aur dene key gaurav, aanand aur ullas kaa apane jeevan mein pahali baar anubhav kiyaa
ghisu ney kahaa-leey jaa, khoob khaa aur aashirvaad dey
mugger teraa aashirvaad usey jaroor pahunchega
royein-royein seey aashirvaad dou, badee gaadhi kamai key paise hain
madhav ney phir aasmaan kii taraf dekhkar kahaa-vaha baikunth mein jaayegi daadaa, baikunth kii raani banegi
ghisu khadaa hoe gayaa aur jaise ullas kii laharon mein tairta huaa bolaa-haan, betaa baikunth mein jaayegi
kissie koo sataaya naheen, kissie koo dabaaya naheen
marate-marate hamari jindagi kii sabse badee lalsa poori curr gayee

vaha naan baikunth jaayegi tou kyaa yeye motey-motey loga jaayenge, joe garibon koo donon haathon seey lootate hain, aur apane paap koo dhone key liye gangaa mein nahaate hain aur mandiron mein jall chadhaate hain
ghisu ney samajhaaya-kyon rotaa haye betaa, khush hoe kii vaha maaya-jaal seey mukt hoe gayee, janjal seey chhoot gayee
badee bhagyavan thee, joe itani jald maaya-moh key bandhan toda diye
aur donon khade hocker gaane lagey-
‘thagini kyon naina jhamkaave
thagini
piyakkadon kii aankhen inki or luggy hui theen aur yeh donon apane dill mein mast gaaye jaate they
phir donon naachane lagey
uchhale bhee, koode bhee
gire bhee, matake bhee
bhaav bhee bataaye, abhinay bhee kiye
aur aakhir nashe mein madmast hocker vaheen gir padey
kazaki jaati kaa paasi thaa, baan hii hansmukh, baan hii sahsi, baan hii jindadil
vaha rose shaam koo daak kaa thaila laker aataa, raat-bhar rahata aur sabere daak laker chalaa jaataa
shaam koo phir udhar seey daak laker aaa jaataa
main dinn bhar aeka udvigna dashaa mein usaki raah dekhaa kartaa

jyon hii chaar bajate, vyakul hoe curr, sasak parr aaa curr, khaan hoe jaataa, aur thoin dair mein kazaki kandho parr ballam rakhe, usaki jhunjhuni bajaata, door seey dautaan huaa aataa dikhalaayi detaa
shareer saanche mein aisaa dhalaa huaa kii chatur moortikaar bhee usamen koee dosh naan nikaal sakata
usaki chhoti-chhoti moonchhen, usake sudaul chehare parr bahut hii achchi maloom hoti theen
mujhe dekh curr vaha aur tej daunen lagata, usaki jhunjhuni aur teji seey bajane lagati, aur merey hriday mein aur jore seey khushi kii dhakan honey lagati
harshaatirek mein main bhee daun pataan aur aeka kshan mein kazaki kaa kandha meraa simhaasan bunn jaataa
vaha sthaan merrie abhilashaon kaa swarg thaa
swarg key nivaasiyon koo bhee shayed vaha aandolit anand naan milata hoga joe mujhe kazaki key vishal kandhon parr milata thaa
sansar merrie aankhon mein tuchchh hoe jaataa aur jaba kazaki mujhe kandho parr liye hue daunen lagata, taba tou aisaa maloom hotaa, maano main havaa key ghoyen parr unaa jaa rahaa huun
thaila rakhate hii vaha humm logon koo leey curr kissie maidan mein nickle jaataa, kabhi hamaare saath khelata, kabhi birahe gaa curr sunata aur kabhi kahaaniyan sunata
main yeye kahaaniyan sunkar vismaypurna anand mein magn hoe jaataa; usaki kahaaniyon key chor aur daku sachche yoddha hotey they, joe ameeron koo loot curr deen-dukhi praaniyon kaa paalan karate they
haan, vaha kazaki hii thaa
kazaki ney hans curr kahaa —maaroge, tou main aeka cheej laaya huun, vaha naan doongaa
kazaki , abhee dikhaa duun, tou daun curr god mein uthaa loge
maine pighal curr kahaa —achchha, dikhaa dou
kazaki , tou aaa curr merey kandho parr baith jaao bhaag chaluun
merrie vijay hui
aaha
merrie usa khushi kaa kaun anuman karega
taba seey kathin pareekshaaen paas keen, achchha pada bhee paaya, raibahadur bhee huaa; parr vaha khushi phir naan hassil hui
main usey god mein liye, usake komal sparsh kaa anand uthaata ghar kii or dauaan
meraa bahut jee chaahata thaa kii koee bachcha mill jaae, tou tumhen duun
phir aaoonga aur tumhen kandho parr baithaa curr kudaaunga
baabu jee ney naukari leey lii haye, tou kyaa itna bhee naan karane denge
tumko chhon curr main kaheen naan jaaoonga, bhaiya
ammaan , arey, yeh tou hiran kaa bachcha haye
sunn-sunn, havaa kii tarah utaan chalaa jaataa thaa
main cull usey apane saath khaana khilaaunga
pahale uska namkaran sanskar huaa
'munnu' naam rakhaa gayaa
phir maine uska apane sub hamjoliyon aur sahpaathiyon seey parichay karaaya
dinn hii bhar mein vaha mujhase itna hill gayaa kii merey peechhe-peechhe daunen lagaa
itani hii dair mein maine usey apane jeevan mein aeka mahattvapurna sthaan dey diyaa
apane bhavishya mein bananewaale vishal bhawan mein usake liye alag kamra banaane kaa bhee nishchay curr liyaa; charpai, sair karane kii fitton aadi kii bhee aayojana curr lii
usake paas ballam bhee thaa, cummer mein chapras bhee thee, sir parr saafaa bhee bandhaa huaa thaa
ballam mein daak kaa thaila bhee bandhaa huaa thaa
main daun curr usaki cummer seey chipat gayaa aur vismit hoe curr bolaa —  tumhen chapras aur ballam kahaan seey mill gayaa, kazaki
kazaki ney mujhe uthaa curr kandho parr baithaalate hue kahaa —vaha chapras kiss kaam kii thee, bhaiya
vaha tou gulami kii chapras thee, yeh purani khushi kii chapras haye
pahale sarkaar kaa naukar thaa, abb tumhara naukar huun
mujhe paise jamaa karke rakhane mein baan aanand aataa thaa
kazaki , bhaiya, khaane koo doge, tou kyon naan aaoonga
maine kahaa —main rose khaane koo doongaa
kazaki bolaa —  tou main rose aaoonga
kazaki koo rose bulaane key liye usa vakt merey paas kohnoor heera bhee hotaa, tou usako bhent karane mein mujhe pasopesh naan hotaa
maine garv seey kahaa —merey hii tou hain
usane bee dair taka idhar-udhar kii sair karaayi, geet sunaaye aur mujhe ghar pahuncha curr chalaa gayaa
haan, yeh soch curr chitt prasann huaa kii abb kazaki bhookhon naan marega
ammaan jee usey rose khaane koo dengi aur vaha rose mujhe kandho parr bithaa curr sair karaayega
doosare dinn main dinn bhar munnu key saath khelata rahaa
khush hoe curr khelane lagaa
mujhe maloom thaa kii ammaan jee joe baat kahati hain, usey puuraa jaroor karati hain
unhone sabere hii aeka harkaare koo bhej diyaa thaa
haan, vaha kazaki hii thaa
bhaiya, tumhen tou kamalgatte bahut achche lagate hain naan
maine usake haathon seey latakati hui potli koo utsuk netron seey dekh curr poochha—kahaan seey laayi hoe
maine uchhal curr poochha—kazaki ney
unhein kamalgatte bahut achche lagate hain
kushal-chhem poochhati aanaa
maine potli seey kamalgatte nikaal liye they aur majey seey chakh rahaa thaa
ammaan ney kahaa —kaha denaa sub kushal haye
maine kahaa —yeh bhee kaha denaa kii bhaiya ney bulaaya haye
ammaan ney poochha—sachmuch bahaal hoe gayaa
baabu jee , aur kyaa jhoothe hii bulaa rahaa huun
maine tou paanchven hii dinn bahaali kii report kii thee
ammaan , yeh tumane achchha kiyaa
baabu jee , usaki bimari kii yahee dawaa haye
praat:kaal main uthaa, tou kyaa dekhta huun kii kazaki laathi tekta huaa chalaa aaa rahaa haye
main usaki or dauaan aur usaki cummer seey chimat gayaa
kazaki ney merey gaal choome aur mujhe uthaa curr kandho parr baithaalane kii cheshta karane lagaa; parr main naan uthh sakaa
taba vaha jaanvaron kii bhaanti bhoomi parr haathon aur ghutanon key bull khaan hoe gayaa aur main usaki peeth parr savaar hoe curr dakkhane kii or chalaa
main usa vakt phoola naan samaata thaa aur shayed kazaki mujhase bhee jyada khush thaa
baabu jee ney kahaa —kazaki, tum bahaal hoe gaye
teesare dinn vaha itna achchha aur aashvast hoe gayaa kii merrie ungali apane dou nanhe panjon seey pakakar, neele kaanch key motiyon jaisi aankhon seey idhar-udhar dekhane lagaa
teen-chaar maas mein usake snigdh roye, jhabbedaar poonchh aur chanchal chamkili aankhen sabako vismit karane lageen
hamane usaki jativachak sangya koo vyaktivaachak kaa roop dey diyaa aur iss prakaar humm usey gillu kahakar bulaane lagey
jaba main likhane baithati taba apani or meraa dhyaan aakarshit karane kii usey itani teevra ichcha hoti thee kii usane aeka achchha upaay khoj nikala
iss girje mein shaadi karwana bahut baan gaurav maanaa jaataa haye
aap sachmuch saubhagyashali hain
pahale dinn yahaan aae - aur saamane ghoan-gaanee
aap hans rahey hain... naheen, meraa matlab kuchh aur thaa

... jee haan... usee tarah jaise kuchh dair pahale aapane thoan-saa sarak curr mujhe bench parr aaney diyaa thaa aur abb main aapse aise baatein curr rahee huun, maano aapako barason seey jaanati huun
jee haan - meraa vivaah bhee issie girje mein huaa thaa
iss lihaz seey main bahut sukhi huun -aggar sukh kaa matlab haye kii humm apane akelepan koo khud chuna sakein
humm donon harr shaam kabhi usa jagah jaate, jahaan mujhe milane seey pahale vaha baithata thaa, yaa usa shahar key una ilaakon mein ghoomane nickle jaate, jahaan maine bachpan gujara thaa

yeh aapako kuchh ajib naheen lagata kii jaba humm kissie vyakti koo bahut chaahane lagate hain, tou naan kewal vartamaan mein usake saath rehna chaahate hain, balki usake ateet koo bhee nigalana chaahate hain, jaba vaha hamaare saath naheen thaa

phir aggar kuchh saal usee aeka aadami key saath gujaar dein, tou yeh kahana bhee asambhav hoe jaataa haye kii kaun-see aadat aapaki apani haye, kaun-see aapane doosare seey churai haye... jee haan, taash key patton kii tarah way iss tarah aapmein ghul-mill jaati hain kii aap kissie aeka patton koo uthaa curr naheen kaha sakate kii yeh pattaa meraa haye, aur vaha pattaa uska
apane aap chup hoe jaayega... munh mein chusani iss tarah dabaa curr letta haye, jaise chhota-motaa sigar hoe
dekhiye-kaise oopar baadlon kii taraf tukur-tukur taak rahaa haye
main jaba chhoti thee, taba lakeen leey curr baadlon kii taraf iss tarah ghumaati thee, jaise way merey ishaaron parr hii akash mein chala rahey houn... aap kyaa sochate hain

ichcha hoti thee, logon koo puck curr shuru seey aakhir taka sub kuchh bataauun... kaise humm pahali shaam alag-alag aeka-doosare kii prateeksha karate rahey they - vaha pub key saamane, main moorti key neeche
kaise usane pahali baar mujhe peyne key taney seey sataa curr chooma thaa, kaise maine pahali baar darte-darte usake baalon koo chhuaa thaa
sangeet kii aavaaj yahaan taka aatee haye
ise sunate hii mujhe pataa chala jaataa haye kii unhone aeka-doosare koo chooma haye, angoothiyon kii adla-badali kii haye
logon mein abb itna chain kahaan kii shaanti seey khein rahein, aggar aap jaa curr dekhana chaahen, tou nishchint hoe curr chaley jaaen
main tou yahaan baithi hii huun
aapke bachche koo dekhti rahoongi
lekin yeh bench mujhe sabse achchi lagati haye
vaha chaar-paanch saal kaa garib- soorat, dubla-patala ladka, jiska baap gata varsh haije kii bhent hoe gayaa aur maan naan jaane kyon pealy hoti-hoti aeka dinn marr gayee
kissie koo pataa kyaa bimari haye
kahati tou kaun sunane vaalaa thaa
dill parr joe kuchh beetati thee, vaha dill mein hii sahati thee or jaba naan sahaa gayaa tou sansar seey vidaa hoe gayee
usake abbajan roopaye kamaane gaye hain
bahut-see thailiyaan laker aayenge
ammijan allah miyaan key ghar seey usake liye badee achchi-achchi cheejen laane gayee hain, isaliye hamid prasann haye
abhagin ameena apani kothri mein baithi row rahee haye
aaj eed kaa dinn, usake ghar mein daanaa naheen
aaj abid hotaa, tou kyaa issie tarah eed aatee or chully jaati
iss andhkaar aur nirasha mein vaha dooby jaa rahee haye
ameena kaa dill kachot rahaa haye
hamid kaa baap ameena key siva aur kaun haye
usey kaise akele melle jaane dey
usa bheed-bhaad seey bachcha kaheen khou jaay tou kyaa hoe
naheen, ameena usey yon naan jaane degi
teen coses chalega kaise
pair mein chhaale parh jaayenge
joote bhee tou naheen hain
paise hotey tou lautate-lautate sub samagri jamaa karke chatpat banaa letee
yahaan tou ghanton cheejen jamaa karate lagenge
maange kaa hii tou bharosa thahara
usa athanni koo eemaan kii tarah bachaati chully aatee thee issie eed key liye lekin cull gwalan sir parr savaar hoe gayee tou kyaa karati
hamid key liye kuchh naheen haye, tou dou paise kaa doodh tou chaahiye hii
abb tou kull dou aaney paise butch rahey hain
yahee tou bisaat haye aur eed kaa tyauhar, allah hii bedaa paar lagaave
kiss-kiss sein munh churaayegi
bachche koo khuda salamat rakhe, yein dinn bhee cutt jaayange
raat koo bechaare ghoom-ghoomkar pahara dete hain, naheen choriyaan hoe jaayan
saaree leii-poonji jall gayee
aeka baratan taka naan bachaa
kaee dinn pedh key neeche soye, allah kasam, pedh key neeche
phir naan jaane kahaan seey aeka sou curge laaye tou baratan-bhande aaye
hamid door khadaa haye
teen hii paise tou usake paas hain
apane kosh kaa aeka tihai jaraa-saa chakkar khaane key liye naheen dey sakata
hamid key paas kull teen paise hain, itane mahange khilaune vaha kaise leey
khilauna kaheen haath seey chhoot padey tou choor-choor hoe jaay
jaraa paani padey tou saaraa rung ghul jaay
aise khilaune laker vaha kyaa karega

hamid khilaunon kii ninda kartaa haye- mitty hii key tou hain, girein tou chaknachur hoe jaayan, lekin lalchai hui aankhon seey khilaunon koo dekh rahaa haye aur chaahata haye kii jaraa dair key liye unhein haath mein leey sakata
usake haath anayas hii lapakate hain, lekin ladke itane tyagi naheen hotey hain, visheshkar jaba abhee nayaa shauk haye
hamid lalchaataa raha jaataa haye
hamid biradari seey prithak haye
abhaage key paas teen paise hain
kyon naheen kuchh laker khaata
lalchaayi aankhon seey sabki or dekhta haye
tavey seey rotiyaan utaarati hain, tou haath jall jaataa haye
ammaan bechari koo kahaan fursat haye kii bajar aayein aur itane paise hii kahaan milate hain
rose haath jalaa letee hain
itani mithaaiyaan leen, mujhe kissie ney aeka bhee naan dee
merey paas paise naheen hain
tabhi tou mohsin aur mahmoud yon mijaz dikhaate hain
main garib sahee, kissie seey kuchh maangane tou naheen jaataa
sabke sub khoob hansenge kii hamid ney chimta liyaa haye
hansein merrie balaa seey
hamid kaa dill baith gayaa
baap seey zid bhee karein, tou chimta naheen mill sakata
mohsin ney aidee-choti kaa jore lagaakar kahaa- achchha, paani tou naheen bhar sakata
hamid iss prabal tark kaa jawab naan dey sakaa
usane poochha- hamein pakadane kaun aayega
usane samajha thaa kii hamid lajwab hoe jaayaga, lekin yeh baat naan hui

jinn samjhauton seey ghabrakar vaha bhaagi thee, vaha yahaan aur bhee vikrit roop mein uska peechha curr rahey they
usake munn mein katuta aatee jaati thee aur ekagra-seva kii dhuna mitati jaati thee

main dwarka seey bhagwan shrikrishnachandra kii patniyon koo hastinapur laa rahaa thaa, kintu maarg mein thode seey bheelon ney mujhe aeka nirbal kii bhaanti paraast curr diyaa
main una ablaaon kii raksha naheen curr sakaa
merrie way hii bhujaaen hain, vahee rath haye, vahee ghode hain, vahee gandiv dhanush haye aur vahee baann hain, jinase maine badey-badey maharathiyon key sir baat kii baat mein udaa diye they
jiss arjun ney kabhi apane jeevan mein shatruon seey muhaki naheen khaai thee, vahee arjun aaj kayaron kii bhaanti bheelon seey parajit hoe gayaa
unaki sampoorn patniyon tathaa dhana aadi koo bheel loga loot leey gaye aur main nihatthe kii bhaanti khadaa dekhta raha gayaa
una bhagwan shrikrishnachandra key binaa merrie sampoorn shakti ksheen hoe gaee haye

aapane joe dwarka mein jinn yadavon kii kushal poochhi haye, way samast yadav brahmanon key shaap seey durbuddhi avastha koo praapt hoe gaye they aur way atee madira paan karke paraspar aeka-doosare koo maarte-maarte mrityu koo praapt hoe gaye
yeh sub unheen bhagwan shrikrishnachandra kii leela haye"

bhagwan shrikrishnachandra ney apane iss laukik shareer seey iss prithvi kaa bhaar utaar curr usey iss prakaar tyag diyaa, jiss prakaar koee kaante seey kaanta nikaalane key pashchaat una konon kaanton koo tyag detaa haye
abb ghor kaliyug bhee aaney vaalaa haye
udhar vidur ney bhee prabhaas kshetra mein bhagavanmay hocker shareer tyag diyaa aur apane yamlok koo prasthaan curr gaye
usane kahaa kii- "merey paksh key logon seey kaha denaa kii main rajyaheen hoe jaane key kaaran sarovar mein pravesh curr gayaa huun"

duryodhan ney uttar mein kahaa kii- "vaha bhayakrant praan-raksha key nimitt vahan naheen haye, apitu kuchh samay vishram karna chaahata haye tathaa usake paas rath ityaadi kii vyavastha bhee naheen haye
apane bandhu-bandhavon key naash key uprant vaha mrigacharm dhaaran karane key liye utsuk haye
pandav mitrashunya dharti parr raajya karein"
way yudhishthir seey boley- "aap logon mein seey bheem seey itar koee bhee duryodhan seey gadaa-yuddh karane yogya naheen haye
aapane dayavash phir bhanyakar bhool kii haye
shrikrishna tathaa arjun ney paraspar vichaar-vimarsh kiyaa kii bheem adhik balwan haye tathaa duryodhan adhik kushal, att: dharmayuddh mein duryodhan koo paraast karna bahut kathin haye
unhone bheem seey kahaa kii- "mitraheen duryodhan abb dayaa kaa paatr haye, upahaas kaa naheen, jisake tarpan key liye bhee koee shesh naheen bachaa haye
" yudhishthir ney duryodhan seey kshama-yaachana kii aur doo:khee honey lagey kii raajya paakar vidhwa bahuon-bhabhiyon koo kaise dekh sakenge
arjun yadi tumane iss nirnaayak modd parr abhee karna koo naheen maaraa tou sambhavatah pandav usey kabhi bhee naheen maar sakenge aur yeh yuddh kabhi bhee naheen jeetaa jaa sakega
taba arjun ney aeka daiviya astra kaa upayog karate hue karna kaa sir dhad seey alag curr diyaa
poochhane parr unhone kahaa kii hamein kuchh yaad naheen kii hamane kyaa kahaa thaa
mujhe tou iss baat seey badaa buraa lugg rahaa haye
manjhali bollie, mujhe bhee badaa buraa lugg rahaa haye
dayalu mantri ney usake pairon parr gir curr kahaa, prithvipal, aap kuchh nyaay-anyaay kaa vichaar karein
isamen raani kaa kyaa aparaadh haye
tou isake liye yeh karein kii malika key paas jaanaa chhod dein
bechari malika bhee ishwariya ichcha samajh curr sub kuchh saha letee
anta samay mein vaha inn teenon seey isase adhik kuchh naan kaha sakaa kii aapas mein mill-jula curr rehna
budhiya ney kahaa, malkin, merrie aapke saath baithane kii haisiyat bilkul naheen haye, lekin aapka anurodh taal bhee naheen sakati, isaliye baith rahee hain
thuck bhee gaee hogi aur raaste mein kuchh khaaya bhee naheen hoga
vriddha ney kahaa, puuraa haal tou main naheen bataa sakati lekin itna bataa sakati huun kii iss desh mein kaheen bhee yeh cheejen naheen mill sakatin
vaha iss chinta mein parh gaee kii uparyukt teenon cheejen kaise praapt kii jaaen
tumhari kuchh tabiyat kharaab haye yaa koee baat tumhari marji key khilaf hoe gaee
parizad ney sir jhukaa curr kahaa, naheen, koee baat naheen haye
kuchh aisaa haye jaroor joe tumhen dukh dey rahaa haye
jaba parizad ney dekhaa kii donon bhaai baat key jaanane parr adey hue hain tou usane kahaa, main tumhen isaliye naheen bataati thee kii joe main kahoongi usase tum chinta aur kasht mein parh jaaoge
main bhee abhee taka yahee samajhati thee kii isamen koee kamee naheen haye kintu aaj mujhe teen cheejon key baare mein maloom huaa kii aggar yahaan aaa jaaen tou hamara mahal advitiya hoe jaae
main issie chinta mein huun kii inhein kaise praapt karuun
abb parizad usey dekh curr rone luggy aur bollie, bhaiya, main bhee badee dusht huun joe apane jaraa-seey shauk key liye tumhen musibat mein fansaa rahee huun
main apani maang vaapas letee huun
abb kabhi teenon cheejon mein aeka kaa bhee ullekh naheen karoongi
tum naan jaao
aggar abb main suffer naheen kartaa tou hamesha merey dill mein yeh khatak rahegi kii main kier huun
parizad ney kahaa, yahaan humm loga bhee tou pareshan rahenge
hamein naheen maloom hoe sakega kii tum kiss haal mein hoe
lekin aggar isamen seey khoon kii buunden tapakane lagein tou samajh lena kii main jeevit naheen rahaa
phir vaha bolaa, haye tapasvi pitaa, tumhari baat merrie samajh mein bilkul naheen aaee
inke kaaran tumhari soorat aadami key bajaay reechh jaisi maloom hoti haye
tapasvi ney kahaa, mujhe maloom tou haye lekin main tumhen isaliye naheen bataana chaahata kii tumhari seva key badale tumhen musibat mein naheen dalna chaahata
siddh ney kahaa, jahaan yeh cheejen hain vahan kaa maarg badaa bhayaavah haye, tumhari tarah beesiyon aadamiyon ney vahan jaane kii raah mujhase poochhi haye aur koee vaapas naheen lauta
isaliye tumse kahata huun kii jahaan seey aae hoe vaapas chaley jaao
tapasvi ney kahaa, bete, yahee tou mushkil haye kii tumhen yuddh kaushal dikhaane kaa avsar naheen milega
tumhen joe shatru milenge way saamane seey mukabala naheen karate balki chhupe taur parr vaar karate hain
mujhe tumhari jawani parr afsos hoe rahaa haye
aggar tumane aeka baar bhee darr curr peechhe kii or dekhaa tou tum aur tumhara ghodaa donon kaale patthar bunn jaayenge
tumhen raah mein milnewale kaale patthar bhee tumhari tarah una teen cheejon kii khoj mein jaanewaale aadami they
peechhe dekhane key kaaran way patthar bunn gaye hain
maine yeh sub tumhen bataa jaroor diyaa haye lekin meraa abb bhee yahee kahana haye kii tum vaapas laut jaao
main saaf dekh rahaa huun kii tum vahan gaye tou kaalaa patthar bunn curr raha jaaoge
pervage ney haath seey khanjar fenk diyaa aur haay-haay karane lagaa
haay bhaiya, merrie nadani seey tumhari zaan gaee
haye bhagwan, tuu bhaiya koo jinda ghar lauta, chaahe merrie maut bhej dey
bhaiya naan rahey tou chidiya, pedh aur paani koo paa curr bhee main kyaa karoongi
mujhe yeh cheejen naheen chaahiye, mujhe aur bhee kuchh naheen chaahiye
mujhe sirf meraa bhaai chaahiye
phir usane kahaa, parizad, abb rone-dhone seey kuchh naheen hoga
badey bhaiya tum seey kuchh cumm bahadur naheen they
doosare dinn usake ravaana honey key samay parizad row curr bollie, badey bhaiya ney tou apani kushal jaanane koo aeka raah bhee bataai thee, tumhara haal mujhe kaise maloom hoga
jiss dinn yeh aeka-doosare seey chipak jaaen aur maalaa naan ferry jaa sakey tou samajh lena kii main bhee duniya mein naheen rahaa
tapasvi ney kahaa, bete, vaha raah bahut khatarnak haye
tum vahan jaane kaa irada naan karo aur yaheen seey laut jaao
vahan seey abhee taka koee vaapas naheen aayaa haye
vaha bhee naheen lauta haye
pervage ney kahaa, vaha meraa badaa bhaai thaa
bahut-seey aadami merrie chetavani key bavjood usa raah parr gaye aur kaale patthar bunn curr vaheen parr raha gaye
siddh ney kahaa, main tumhare saath chala sakata tou koee baat naheen thee kintu budhaape key kaaran main naheen jaa sakuungaa
tum zid karate hoe tou jaao

parizad usa samay tou dukh key kaaran achet hoe gaee kintu baad mein hosh aaney parr usane faisala kiyaa kii donon bhaaiyon koo maut key munh mein bhejane key baad abb merey jeevan kaa bhee koee arth naheen haye
abb tou yahaan seey yuun hii vaapas naheen jaa sakati
usane chidiya seey poochha, yahaan aaney kii raah mein merey donon badey bhaai kaale patthar baney padey hain
main tou yeh naheen pehchaanati kii una pattharon mein kaun-seey merey bhaai hain
mahanubhavo, tum loga sou naheen rahey they, tum kaale patthar kii chattan bunn curr yahaan padey hue they
jaba mujhe chidiya, paani aur pedh kii tahani mill gaee tou inke milane seey bhee tumhare bagair mujhe buraa lugg rahaa thaa
sub logon koo iss baat kaa badaa khed rahaa kii antim baar usey dhanyavaad naan dey sakey
majburi mein way ghodon seey utare aur badshah koo jhuk curr salaam karane lagey
hamaare pitaa naheen rahey

bahman ney nivedan kiyaa, sarkaar, hamaare pitaa asamay hii jaate rahey aur hamara nirdeshak koee naheen rahaa, isiliye humm logon kaa gyaan adhura haye aur anya naujavanon kii tarah hamse bhee bhool hoe jaati haye
iss uddandata key liye kshama chaahate hain
abb yeh donon ghabaraae
aakhir mein bahman ney kahaa, hamse badee bhool hui, humm apani bahan seey salah lena bilkul bhool gaye
lekin way usa dinn bhee bhool gaye aur teesare dinn phir badshah key saamane lajjit hoe curr kahaa kii humm loga aaj bhee aapaki aagya kaa paalan karna bhool gaye
usane kahaa kii yeh tou tumhara saubhagya haye kii badshah ney tumhen khaane parr bulaaya haye kintu tumane yeh badaa buraa kiyaa kii dou dinn taka badshah taka kii kahee hui baat koo bhoole rahey
kyaa tumhari raay mein abb unakaa jaanaa munasib haye, badshah kaheen naraj naan houn
main unaki suraksha key liye darti rahati huun
isake alawa usane hamein buraa-bhalaa bhee kahaa kii humm dou dinn taka yeh kyon bhoole rahey
donon bhaai yeh suna curr badey lajjit hue kii badshah humm parr itna kripalu haye aur humm usake prati itane laparwah hain
way lajja key maare badshah seey door-door hii rahey
unamen aapas mein baatein hoteen kii badshah ney jiss malika koo pinjade mein kaid curr rakhaa haye usake pett seey bachche paida hotey tou way itane hii badey hotey
badshah sochane lagaa kii aggar aise kushagra-buddhi aur veer shehzade usake hotey tou kitna achchha hotaa
maine bahut virodh karna chaaha kii badshah ise majaak samajhenge aur kruddh bhee hoe sakate hain
way bechaare chupchaap chaley gaye
main bhee sochata huun jinn baaton parr maine vishvaas kiyaa way buddhi seey koson door hain

phir bhee maine una parr isaliye vishvaas kiyaa kii swayam malika kii bahanon ney yeh kahaa thaa aur maine socha kii way jhooth naan kahengi kyonki way usaki sagee bahanen theen, usaki hitchintak theen
chidiya ney kahaa, sarkaar seey yahee tou bhool hui kii aap ney unhein hitchintak samajha
usane malika koo bataaya kii maine tumhen joe dund diyaa uska kaaran tumhari way bahanen hii theen jinhen tumane aur maine tumhara hitchintak samajha thaa
kintu usaki vaapsee key kuchh dinn hii pahale usake vyaapaari mitra ney usake saath dhokha curr daalaa thaa
huaa yeh kii aeka dinn vyaapaari key aaney key kuchh dinn hii pahale usake vyaapaari mitra ney usake saath dhokha curr daalaa thaa
alikhwaza ney ruaanse hoe curr kahaa, bhaai, main ishwar kii saugandh khaa curr kahata huun kii maine tail kii handiya kii taha mein aeka hazaar asharfiyaan rakhee theen
aggar tum ney unhein kissie jarurat seey kharch curr diyaa haye tou koee baat naheen, baad mein vaapas curr denaa
vyaapaari mitra ney kahaa, alikhwaza, tum cassie baatein curr rahey hoe
alikhwaza ney usake bahut haath-paanv jode
usane kahaa, asharfiyaan naan mileen tou main barbad hoe jaaoonga
merey paas iss samay kuchh bhee naheen haye
mujh parr dayaa karo aur meraa maal mujhe dey dou
maine bhed khulane key darr seey kissie koo yeh baat naheen bataai thee
usane haath jodd curr kahaa, sarkaar mujh parr dayaa keejiye
main apana aparaadh sweekaar kartaa huun
maine aeka maheene pahale hii iss haandi kaa tail aur asharfiyaan nikaal curr isamen doosara tail bharaa thaa
phir dusht swabhaav kaa honey key baad bhee duryodhan aakhir hamara bhaai hii haye
usake saath kii raaj mahilaaen hamaare hii kull kii mahilaaen hain aur unakaa niraadar honey seey hamaare hii kull koo kalank lagega
draupadi key vachanon koo sunkar karna ney lajjit hocker dhanush baann rakh diyaa

gangaa key garbh seey maharaj shantanu key aathh putra hue, jinamen seey saat koo gangaa ney gangaa nadee mein leey jaakar bahaa diyaa aur apane diye huye vachan mein bandhe honey key kaaran maharaj shantanu kuchh boll naan sakey
tumane merey saat putron koo nadee mein bahaa diyaa, kintu apani pratigya key anusaar maine kuchh naan kahaa
abb tum merey iss aathven putra koo bhee bahaane jaa rahee hoe
main tumse prarthana kartaa huun kii kripa karke ise nadee mein mutt bahaao
aapane apani pratigya bhang curr dee haye, isaliye abb main aapke paas naheen raha sakati
nishaad key inn vachanon koo sunkar maharaj shantanu chupchaap hastinapur laut aaye
maharaj kii iss dashaa koo dekhkar devvrat koo badee chinta hui

unheen dinon hiranyadhanu naamak nishaad kaa putra ekalavya bhee dhanurvidya seekhane key uddeshya seey dronacharya key ashram mein aayaa, kintu karna key samaan hii nimn varna kaa honey key kaaran dronacharya ney usey apana shishya banaana sweekaar naheen kiyaa
meraa abhivaadan bhee sweekaar naheen curr rahee hoe
brahmin key saamane bakare ney yeh batalaaya kii vaha bhee kabhi aeka brahmin-purohit thaa aur aeka baar usane bhee aeka bakare kii bully chadhaayi thee, jisaki saana vaha aaj taka paa rahaa thaa
kintu vaha doo:khee hoe curr isaliye roya thaa kii agali baar seey usa brahmin key bhee sir paanch sou baar kaate jaayenge
teesara dall bhee thaa, joe dabi jabaan seey kahata thaa kii rashtra kaa aeka aur stambh gir gayaa
teesare dall ney nairashyapurna bhaav seey sir hilaa diyaa, parr munh seey kuchh naan kahaa
usey vishvaas hii naan aataa thaa kii yeye shabd mehta kii jabaan seey nikale honge

buss, saare patra mein merey jaati-droh aur durgati kaa rona haye
usaki drishti mein main jaati kaa shatru, dhoort-swarthandh, duratma, sub kuchh huun
main naheen samajhata kii usake vichaaron mein itna antar kaise hoe gayaa
main tou usey bahut hii shaant-prakriti, gambhir, sushil, sachcharitr aur siddhantpriya navyuvak samajhata thaa aur usa parr garv kartaa thaa

patra haath seey chhoot curr gir paan

mujhe apane poojya pitaa key prati aise kitane hii nindasoochak drishya dekhane penge
iss aadarsh-virodh kaa anta hii curr denaa achchha haye
sambhav haye, meraa jeevan unake nirdisht maarg mein baadhak hoe
ishwar mujhe bull pradaan karey
alibaba kii patni nirdhan vyakti kii putri thee isaliye vaha bechara garib hii rahaa
vaha dhana itna thaa kii usase main jeevan bhar aaraam seey raha sakata thaa kintu maine bhog-vilas mein saaraa dhana sheeghra udaa diyaa
usane kahaa, tum raat-dinn bekaar mehnat karate hoe
maine kahane koo tou kaha diyaa kintu merey munn mein dwandwa honey lagaa
kabhi sochata kii bekaar hii aeka oonta ise dene koo kahaa
maine vivashata mein usaki baat sweekaar curr lii
aapako tou isase bhagwan kii aradhana mein kathinaaee hii hogi
lekin main sochata hann kii aap jaise sant mahatma tees oonton koo bhee kaise sanbhaalenge
isase aapaki saadhana-aradhana mein bahut vighn padegaa
kintu main abhaga itane seey bhee santusht naan huaa
maine baaki duss oonton kaa vichaar apane munn seey nikaalana chaaha kintu mujhe unakaa dhyaan banaa rahaa
saare oonta paa curr bhee merey munn kaa khot naan gayaa
main lalach mein andhaa tou hoe hii rahaa thaa
merrie akl parr parada padaa huaa thaa
main aeka baar bhalai karke abb tere saath burai kyon karuun
mujhe apaar dukh huaa, mujhe apani moorkhata yaad naan rahee
maine fakir koo bhalaa-buraa kahana shuru kiyaa aur kahaa,
maine tou tumhari bhalai kaa bharsak prayatn kiyaa thaa aur tumhen hamesha satparamarsh hii diyaa thaa kintu tumane merrie baaton koo kapatpurna samajha aur galat baaton key liye zid kii
abb joe kuchh hoe gayaa haye vaha mujhase thheek naheen hoe sakata, tumhari drishti kabhi vapis naheen lautegi
maine usase bahut hii gidgida curr kahaa, saaeen jee, mujhe abb koee lalach naheen rahaa
abb shauk seey saaree dhana sampada aur merey sabhi assie oonta leey jaaie, sirf merrie aankhon kii jyoti vaapas dilaa deejiye
oonton key chalane kii aavaaj suna curr main chillaya,
sciengy, itani kripa tou keejiye kii iss jangal mein issie dashaa mein naan chhodiye
apane saath liye chaliye
kintu usane merrie baat naan sunee aur chalaa gayaa
mujhe maarg kaa bhee gyaan naan thaa kii paidal hii chala detaa
anta mein thuck curr gir rahaa aur bhookh pyaas seey maranasanna hoe gayaa
abb merey saamane isake alawa koee raasta naheen rahaa kii main bheekh maang curr pett paloon
mujhe apane lalach aur moorkhata kaa itna khed huaa kii maine kasam khaa lii kii kissie seey taba taka bheekh naheen luungaa jaba taka vaha merey sir parr aeka dhaul naan maare
isiliye cull maine aapse dhrishtata kii thee
tumhari moorkhata tou bahut badee thee
ander seey kissie bachche kii maheen aavaaj aaee – “abhee bartan maanj rahaa huun”
“aayaa… kahate hue karib 9 yaa 10 varsh kaa goraa saa patala dubla lakaan khadaa thaa
voe sedan rung kii maheen sooti baniyaain aur ghutanon taka kii bhuri haann pent pahane tharthara rahaa thaa

disambar kii jiss kakakati jiss thhand mein voe oonee dastaane, topi, joote aur moje pahan curr bhee thhandi havaa mahsoos curr rahee thee vaheen voe chhota saa bachcha aadhi geeli baniyaain mein thartharata huaa khaan thaa
“jee, abhee abhee banaa curr laataa huun” kahate hue chhotu ney rimjhim kii tarr muskurakar dekhaa parr usaki aankhon mein udasi saanna narar aaa rahee thee

sardi key dher saare rangbirangen foolon key beach mein baithkar coffey peena rimjhim kaa sapana thaa parr jaba chhotu ney usey coyne pakaain tou pataa naheen kyon voe chhotu seey narein naheen milaa sakee
naa tou usey coffey achchi lugg rahee thee aur naa hii foolon seey ladaa voe bagicha
voe turant apane ghar bhaag jaanaa chaahati thee, parr kyaa kahey swaati seey
voe kitna khush haye usey dekhkar rir tou usa ghar mein rimjhim key liye 3 dinn kaatna mushkil hoe gayaa
jooton mein polish seey laker ghar key joothe bartan taka kii immedaari chhotu kii thee
jaba sub baithkar dining table parr baithkar leenan vyanjan unaa rahey hotey tou bechara chhotu sabako chauke seey germ germ ulke laakar pakaan rahaa hotaa
rimjhim key galey mein hamesha niwala atak jaataa aur voe chhotu kii nararon kaa saamana naheen curr paati
