bahut dinon baad pachchis varsh poorv ghatee ghatana kaa sampoorn drishya najaron key saamane roodh hoe gayaa
akeli khadee chitraji
dou nanhe bachche maan seey chipke
apana-paraaya koee saath naan thaa
nirnay lena thaa chitraji koo
sabkuchh chalaa gayaa thaa
joe bachaa thaa, usaki maang thee
chitraji ney vaha vastu denaa sweekaar curr liyaa, joe unaki thee
unaki drishti key sammukh vaha chehra naheen aayaa, jisaki unhein khoj thee
maano kheejhakar bollie, ‘‘abb baith jaaie
’’ chitraji ander seey hill gaeen
oopar seey upasthit janon kii nigaahon key teeron seey bindh gaeen
way pareshan tou thee heen
main vidhwa huun
meraa suhag naheen haye
samaaj aisee mahila koo kissie saubhagyakankshini koo suhag dene kii manahi kartaa haye
’’ way baith gaeen
kaarya vyastata mein bhee main aapke prashnon key baanon seey bindhata rahaa
‘‘pachchis varsh poorv aeka durghatana mein chitraji key pati ghayal hoe gaye
unake mastishk ney kaam karna bund curr diyaa thaa
jiss aspatal mein unhein laaya gayaa, usee key aeka kamare mein main operation bedd parr letta thaa
merey dill ney kaam karna bund curr diyaa thaa
bhalaa jeevit kaa hriday koee kyon daan karey
chitraji key pati kaa dill dhadak rahaa thaa
mastishk ney kaarya karna bund curr diyaa thaa
doctor sharma ney inase anurodh kiyaa—‘‘aapke pati koo abb humm naheen bachaa sakate
meraa dill pichhale pachchis varshon seey dhadak rahaa haye, yeh meraa naheen, inke pati kaa dill haye
parr pichhale pachchis varshon mein inhone aeka baar bhee ehsan naheen jataaya
inhone tou mujhe taba bhee naheen jaanaa, naan dekhaa thaa
maine bhee naheen
inhone kabhi mujhe dhoondhane kii koshish bhee naheen kii
parr main bahut bechain thaa
jeevan denewali key prati aabhaar bhee naheen pragat curr sakaa
meraa durbhagya kii inase taba bhee bhent naheen hoe sakee
maine bhee inco aaj subah hii pahali baar dekhaa
’’ kanyadan key rasm key samay tou sabki aankhen bharati hain
shaligramji ney tou kanyadan key poorv hii upasthit sabhi aankhon mein paani bhar diyaa
iss ladke kii vajah seey hii vaha pardes mein padee hui thee, jahaan naan koee usaki jabaan samajhata thaa, naan vaha kissie kii jabaan samajhati thee
aeka irawati thee, jisase vaha tooty-footy hindi boll letee thee, haalaanki usaki panjabi hindi aur irawati kii konkani hindi mein zameen-aasmaan kaa antar thaa

jaba irawati bhee usaki seedhe-saade shabdon mein kahee hui sadharan-see baat koo naan samajh paati, tou vaha buri tarah apani vivashata key khed seey daba jaati thee aur iss ladke koo ratti-bhar chinta naheen thee kii maan kiss mushkil seey dinn kaatati haye aur kiss basebry seey meraa intazaar karati haye
aae tou ghar aaa gaye, naheen tou jahaan huaa padey rahey
basti santacruz key havaai adde seey kewal aadhaa meal key faasale parr thee, parr pulis kii aankh vahan naheen pahunchati thee
door seey hii usa aadami kii aavaaj sunkar bachan kaa dill dhadakane lagata thaa aur vaha apana darvaazaa bund curr letee thee

usane kitni hii baar binni seey kahaa thaa kii vaha usa basti seey makaan badal leey, parr vaha harr baar yeh kahakar taal detaa kii bambai kii or kissie basti mein bees rupaye mahine mein utanaa achchha makaan naheen mill sakata
bachan darr key maare binni key aaney taka lalten kii lau bhee zyaadaa oonchi naheen karati thee
andhera bahut bojhil prateet hotaa thaa parr vaha munn maar curr baithi rahati thee
lalten kii chimani neeche seey aadhi kaali hoe rahee thee
bachan koo usey saaf karane kaa utsaah naheen huaa
vaha una aksharon kii banaavat jaanati thee, parr hazaar aankhen gadaakar bhee unakaa arth naheen zaan sakati thee
binni seey chitthi padhvaakar bhee usey sukh naheen milata thaa
lekin aksar vaha bahut tanga parh jaati thee
anek raatein aisee guzarati theen jaba vaha ghar aataa hii naheen thaa
andhere ghar kii chhat usey dabaane koo aatee thee aur yeh saaree raatein karvatein badalati rahati thee
zaraa aankh jhapakane parr burey-burey sapane dikhaai dene lagate they
isaliye kaee baar vaha prayatn karke aankhen khuli rakhti thee
aur vaha aataa thaa tou apane mein hii ulajha huaa vyast-saa
jahaan taka kamaane kaa sawal thaa, vaha maheene mein kathinata seey saath-sattar rupaye ghar laataa thaa
kabhi duss rupaye adhik leey aataa tou saath hii apani pachas maangen usake saamane rakh detaa
usaki baaton seey bachan key hothon parr rukhi-see muskurahat aaa jaati thee
duss rupaye mein usey ghar-bhar kaa saamaan chaahiye
aur jaba vaha saath seey bhee cumm rupaye laataa, tou mahine bhar kii badee aasaan yojana usake saamane prastut curr detaa, 'doodh-dahee kaa naagaa, daal, pyaaz khushk phulake aur buss
vaha jaanati thee kii yeye rupaye bhee vaha tution-wushion karke leey aataa haye, varna sahee arth mein vaha bekaar haye

usake dill mein badey-badey mansoobe avashya they aur unakaa bakhan karate samay vaha chhota-motaa bhashan dey daaltaa thaa, parantu una mansoobon koo puuraa karane key liye jiss duniya kii zaroorat thee, vaha duniya abhee banani rahati thee aur vaha josh seey ungaliyaan nachaa-nachaa curr kahaa kartaa thaa kii maan, vaha duniya bunn jaayegi tou tujhe pataa chalega kii teraa nalayak betaa kitna layak haye
parr kaee baar vaha bahut guma-suma aur bund-bund saa rahata thaa, tou usey ulajhan honey lagati thee
parantu praay: usaki daal kii patili khaali hoe jaati thee aur yeh dekhkar kii una logon kii khaane kii kaamana abhee bunny hui haye, usey ghar kaa abhaav apana aparaadh prateet hotaa thaa
aise samay usaki aankhon mein namee chhaa jaati aur vaha dhyaan bantaane key liye anya kaam karane lagati
way loga rukhi namkeen rotiyon kii faramaaish karate tou vaha chupchaap banaa detee, parantu unhein khilaane kaa uska saaraa utsaah samaapt hoe chuka hotaa
aur una logon key bahas-mubahise kabhi shaant naheen hotey they
usake baad phir neeravata chhaa jaati, joe bahut hii aswaabhaavik aur dumm ghotane-vaali prateet hoti thee
jaba binni dou-dou dinn ghar naheen aataa, tou usa neeravata key or-chhor guma hoe jaate aur vaha apane koo sadaa seey gahare shoonya ekant mein padee hui mahsoos karati
rotty aajaddanahin bunny haye,'' bachan bollie,''mujhe kyaa pataa thaa kii laat saahab aaj bhee ghar aaenge kii naheen
raat kii rotty maine sabere khaai, sabere kii abb khaai
main kiss tarah rose-rose baasi rotty khaati rahuun
yahaan tandur hain kahaan, jahaan jaa curr khaa luun
bachan ney vaakya aarambh kiyaa thaa meethi jhidaki key roop mein, parr samaapt karate-karate usaki aankhen geeli hoe gaee
bachan ney usaki nazar bachaakar apani aankhen ponchh leen
baansi rotty khaane koo maan joe haye
usane card key sambandh mein zaraa jigyasa prakat naheen kii
bachan kaa dill dukh gayaa

vaha gillas binni key aage rakhkar binaa aeka shabd kahey ahaate mein chully gaee aur charpai parr daree daal curr parh gaee uska dill uchhalkar aankhon mein baha aaney koo hoe rahaa thaa, parr vaha kissie tarah chehra sakht karke apane koo roke rahee
thodi dair mein binni joothe paani seey haath dhokar, munh ponchhata huaa andar aaa gayaa
kaheen naheen haye'' bachan ney roondhe hue swar mein kahaa aur karwat badal lii
bhaiyya kii tabiyat thheek naheen hain,'' vaha lalten jameen parr rakhkar maan kii charpai key paitaane baith gayaa
bachan sahasa uthkar baith gaee
laali ney likhaa thaa kii uska bloodpresher phir badh gayaa thaa, doctorne usey aaraam karane kii salah dee haye
kusum kaa swaasthya abb thhik haye aur uska rung laali parr aaa rahaa haye
aur bachchon koo vahan seey school jaane mein bhee dikkat hoti thee
abb diwali paas aaa rahee haye isaliye bachche maan koo bahut yaad karate hain
maan koo gaye chha: mahine seey oopar hoe gaye hain, isaliye sabka dill maan key liye udas haye
yeh naheen likhaa kii kiss doctor kaa ilaaj chala rahaa haye
binni ney baat anayas kaha dee thee, parr bachan kaa hriday chhil gayaa
agale dinn subah hii vaha 'abhee thodi dair mein aaoonga' kahakar gayaa aur dopahar taka lautkar naheen aayaa
bachan kaa kissie kaam mein dill naheen lugg rahaa thaa
phir bhee usane khaana banaaya aur ghar key sabhi chhote-motey kaam poore kiye
mahine kii unnis tarikh thee aur unnis tarikh koo usake paas kabhi paise naheen rahate they
nakad savaa bees kharch karke aayaa huun aur way bhee udhaar key'' bachan koo buraa lagaa kii vaha baahar key aadami key saamane aisee baat kaha rahaa haye
vaha kuchh naan kahakar kapade lapetane luggy
tuu rotty khaa leey, main baandh letee huun,'' bachan kii aankhen bhar aaee
rotty khanewala aadami saath laaya huun,'' vaha maan key lapete hue kapadon koo firse failata huaa bolaa,''yeh isaliye aayaa haye kii tuu chully jaayegi tou tere haath kii daal phir kahaan milegi
bachan kii geeli aankhon mein halki-see muskurahat bhar gaee
raat koo bhee bachan ney thheek seey naheen khaaya thaa, isaliye bhookh key maare uska sir chakra rahaa thaa
usa samay shayed way yeh bhee bhool gaye they kii way usey gaadi parr chadhaane aae hain
bachan key hothon parr rookhi-see muskurahat aaa gaee
abb kaba aaegi
chitthi usaki aaj bhee naheen aaee
naan jaane iss ladke koo kyaa hoe gayaa haye
sirf chitthi poochhane hii aaee thee''
muvakkilon kii vajah seey uska khaane-peene kaa bhee samay nishchit naheen rahata
nae ghar mein aaa jaane seey jagah kaa aaraam avashya hoe gayaa thaa, parr kachahari pahale seey bhee door hoe gaee thee
usaki vyastata key kaaran vaha kaee baar saaraa-saaraa dinn usase baat naheen curr paati thee
raat koo jaba vaha baithak seey uthh curr jaataa, tou seedha soney key kamare mein chalaa jaataa
main kaee baar kahati huun, parr way dalvaate hii naheen,'' kusum jaise rataa-rataaya uttar detee
daalane koo naukar haye mugger way dalvaate hii naheen''
jaba bhee bachan koee kaam karane key liye kahati tou kusum naukar kaa zikr curr detee --
mugger chaar dinn mein hii unake liye usaki naveenata samaapt hoe gaee thee
unaki apani chhoti-chhoti vyastataaen thee, jinamen unakaa samay bantaa huaa thaa
kii maan dono bhaaiyon seey adhik sneh karati thee
munn taane-baane bunane lagaa
kamare mein khidki khuli thee aur door taka khula akash dikhaai dete hue una nakshatron key vinyas seey vaha parichit thee
vahee nakshatra, vaha bambai kii usa manhus basti mein oopar bhee jhilamilate dekhaa karati thee
usee tarah lette hue vaha binni kii aahat kii prateeksha karati thee
humph-humph kii dhwaniyaan paas aatee aur door chully jaati theen
nau-saadhe nau baje bachchon key sou jaane key baad nistabdhata chhaa jaati thee
kewal rangilal key baratan malane yaa chauka dhone kii hii aavaaz sunai detee thee
usane karwat badal lii kii kissie tarah neend aaa jaae
neend naan aanaa rose kii baat hoe gaee thee
kahaan duss baje seey hii usaki aankhon mein neend bhar jaati thee aur kahaan abb vaha gyaarah, baarah aur aeka key ghante ginati rahati thee
uthane parr uska hriday raat seey adhik asthir aur ashant thaa
itna badaa pahaad-saa dinn aur usake baad phir vaisi hii raat
lumby nishkriyata kii kalpana seey aeka badaa shoonya usake antar koo ghere thaa
parantu aaj usey iss baat kii ulajhan hoe rahee thee kii uska bhajan mein munn kyon naheen lagata
abb jaba kii bhajan key liye puuraa avkash thaa, usaki pravritti usaki or kyon naheen hoti thee
maan jee, aap naan leey jaaie, saahab mujhpar naraj honge
usane pahali baar lakshit kiyaa kii laali key baal kanpatiyon key paas seey safed hoe gaye hain
chashma utaar dene seey usaki aankhon key neeche gahare gaddhe nazar aaa rahey they
naheen, koee khaas baat tou naheen thee
naukar chaay laa rahaa thaa, maine kahaa, main leey jaati huun
aeka baat sochati huun'' vaha kahane luggy
itane dinn hoe gaye, binni kii chitthi naheen aaee
bachan kii aankhen bhar aaee
usane cheshta kii kii aansuu aankhon mein hii rook jaaen parr yeh sambhav naheen huaa tou usane palle seey aankhen ponchh lii
vahan rahkar main hii joe thodaa-bahut dekh letee thee, sou dekh letee thee
kabhi-kabhi sochati huun kii main vahan usake paas hii rahuun tou thheek haye
main kahati huun merrie aankhon key saamane rahega tou mujhe pataa tou chalata rahega kii kyaa kartaa haye, kyaa naheen kartaa
usake swar mein thodi yaachana bhee aaa gaee
maan jee kaa yahaan dill naheen lagaa
palbhar laali kii aankhen usase millie raheen
abhee tou maan tuu aaee hii haye,'' vaha bolaa,''duss-pandrah rose mein diwali haye
meraa bachchon koo chhod curr jaane koo munn kartaa haye kyaa
vaha phir seey chalane key liye taiyar hoe curr bollie, ''pataa naheen rotty bhee thheek seey khaata haye yaa naheen
bachan kuchh kshan khamosh rahee
teree tabiyat kii chinta rahegi
tuu chitthi likhata rahega naan

kusum gaadi chalane taka usake paas baith curr baatein karati rahee kii daadi key peechhe bachche phir udas hoe jaayenge, teen chaar dinn ghar suunaa-suunaa lagega aur kahaa kii raaste key liye khaana banwakar leey jaati tou achchha thaa
sahasa usey laali key safed baalon kaa dhyaan hoe aayaa
gaadi chala dee tou usane haath jodd diye
seelwa koo usa vyakti kii dashaa parr dayaa aayee
vaha maheene bhar mein phir seelwa key paas pahunch curr usake shesh daanton kii yaanchna curr baithaa
kshan bhar mein vaha aadami seelwa key masoodhon koo kaat-chhed curr usake saare daant-samool nikaal curr aur apane gantavya koo tatkaal prasthaan curr gayaa
khoon seey lathpath dard seey vyakul karahata seelwa phir jeevit naan raha sakaa aur kuchh samayoparant dumm toun gayaa
usey sabkuchh praapt thaa kintu usey bahut dinon taka koee santan naheen hui jisase vaha bahut dukhi rahata thaa
kintu budhaape kii aulaad honey kii vajah seey vaha laad mein kuchh bigad bhee gayaa aur apavyayi hoe gayaa
kunchh samay key baad uska pitaa rogagrast huaa aur koee dawaa usa parr prabhaavkaari naan hui
phir boodhaa badshah marr gayaa
anubhav tou thaa naheen, ekbaargi itna kosh paaya tou donon haathon seey lutaane lagaa aur bhog-vilas mein pravritt hoe gayaa
usaki maan ney bahut samajhaane kii koshish kii kintu usane usaki baat ansuni curr dee
falatah khajaana khaali hoe gayaa
raajya-prabandh chaupat hoe gayaa aur sanic naukari chhodane lagey
tumhen akele itani lambi yatra naheen karni chaahiye
jainussanam jagaa tou sochane lagaa kii iss boodhe ney mujhe achchha bevakoof banaaya, aggar basra hii mein mujhe dhana praapti honey thee tou kahira taka kyon daudaaya
usane socha kii yeh bhee achchha huaa kii yeh baat maine apani maan key siva kissie aur seey naheen kaheen, naheen tou sabhi loga merrie moorkhata parr hansate
usane lagbhag aeka gaj gahara gadhaa khod daalaa lekin vahan aeka paisa bhee naheen nikla
vaha yakayak baith gayaa aur sochane lagaa kii main phir moorkh banaa
merrie maan koo maloom hoga tou bahut hansegi aur kahegi kii ladka pagal hoe gayaa haye, bekaar hii mahal khod curr kharaab kiyaa
jainussanam ney kahaa, itani badee nadee humm kaise paar karenge
yahaan tou koee naav bhee naheen haye
aggar vaha yahaan kissie bhayaanak roop mein aayega tou uska matlab yeh hoga kii vaha hamaare aaney seey prasann naheen haye aur humm loga badey dukh mein parh jaayenge
kintu kathinaaee yeh haye kii main uska vaahya saundarya tou dekh sakata huun kintu usake antahkaran kaa haal mujhe kiss prakaar gyaat hoe sakata haye
humm manushya aeka- doosare key dill kaa haal naheen jaanate
una sub key chehare tou saundarya mein suraj-chaand koo sharmaate they kintu jaba jainussanam ney unakaa roop jaadoo key darpan mein dekhaa tou harr aeka koo kuroop paaya,
aeka bhee ladki aisee naheen millie joe usa darpan mein sunder dikhaai detee
abb tou majburi mein doosari jagah talash karna hii thaa
usane kahaa, shehzade seey kahiye kii main iss baat parr badaa lajjit huun kii abhee taka aapaki bhent koo naan aaa sakaa
vahan jaa curr apani patni koo mujhe jinnon key badshah koo dey denaa padegaa
main chaahata huun kii usey leey curr apane desh chalaa jaauun aur usake saath aaraam seey rahuun
mubarak ney kahaa, aisee baat munn mein bhee naan laaie
aap apani patni seey sambhog karane key pahale hii kaal key grass bunn jaayenge
mubarak ney kahaa, sundari, tuu apane pati koo kabhi naheen dekh sakegi
usane tujh seey vivaah apani patni banaane key liye naheen balki jinnon key badshah koo dene key liye kiyaa thaa
vaha tou tumhen bahut chaahata haye kintu aggar usane tumhen jinnon key badshah koo naan diyaa tou usake haath seey maaraa jaayega
vaha yeh suna curr rone luggy aur bollie, tum loga kayamat mein khuda koo kyaa munh dikhaaoge
tum vivaah kaa dhong rachaa curr mujhe jinnon key haathon seey marvaane key liye laae hoe
way donon bhee dukhi hue kintu curr hii kyaa sakate they
iss saare arse mein vaha apani sundari patni koo yaad karke rotaa rahaa jise usane marane key liye jinnon key badshah koo dey diyaa thaa aur vaha bhee usake aur usake pitaa key saath chhal curr key

sub seey milane-julane key baad vaha apani maan key mahal mein gayaa aur usey yatra kaa puuraa vrittaant bataaya aur kahaa kii baghdad key bhootpoorv mantri kii putri seey vivaah karke usey jinnon key badshah koo dey aayaa huun
jainussanam ney munh seey tou kuchh naan kahaa kintu munn mein kahata rahaa kii aisee sunder jeevit moorti koo khone key baad main murda moorti leey curr kyaa karoonga
jainussanam ney kahaa, bhagwan hii jaanata haye kii tumhen chhodane kaa mujhe kitna dukh thaa
kintu main vachanbaddh thaa
aur phir iss baat kaa darr thaa kii vachan todane parr jinnon kaa badshah mujhe maar daalega
maine tou raaste mein bhee kaee baar socha kii vachan toda curr tumhen apane mahal mein leey aaoon, kintu merey vayovriddh mitra ney mujhe iss baat seey roke rakhaa
mujhe naveen moorti kii bilkul chinta naheen thee kintu mubarak ney jinnon key badshah koo naraj karane seey mujhe baaj rakhaa
beton koo oonche ohadon parr dekhane kaa arman liye hii unhone aankhen moond leen
zaahir haye, donon bhaaiyon key baal-bachche aeka hii makaan mein rahane parr bhee bheetar sub alag-alag thaa

kachchi gully key beechon-beach, gully key muhaane parr lagey kameti key null seey tapakate paani kii kaali dhaar bahati rahati, jisake kinare ghaas uga aayee thee
naali parr machharon aur makkhiyon key baadal umaten rahate

valid saahab kaa intakaal hoe chuka thaa
doosara koee bhaai valda kii fikr karane aayaa naheen;
kabhi bachche koo takleef haye, tou kabhi zachchaa koo
aise vakt mein curz kii jarurat kaise naan hoe
ghar-baar hoe, tou curz bhee hoga hii
zaroorat panein parr chaudhari ghar kii koee chhoti-motee cheez girvi rakh curr udhaar leey aatey
girvi rakhane seey rupaye key baarah aaney hii milate
byaaj milakar solah oney hoe jaate aur phir cheez key ghar laut aaney kii sambhavana naan rahati
bheetar joe hoe, pardaa salamat rahata
makaan kii dion key kivaaye galate-galate bilkul gull gaye
kaee dafe kasey jaane seey petch toot gaye aur surakh dheele papas gaye
makaan malik suraju pandey koo usaki fikr naan thee
chaudhari kabhi jaakar kahate-sunate tou uttar milata
aakhir kivaaye gir gaye
muhalle mein safedposhi aur izzat honey parr bhee chor key liye ghar mein kuchh naan thaa
vaha parada bhee taar-taar hotey-hotey aeka raat aandhi mein kissie bhee haalat mein latakane layak naan raha gayaa
doosare dinn ghar kii ekmatra pushtaini cheez daree daravaaze parr latak gayee
dou gaz taat aathh aaney seey cumm mein naan mill sakata thaa
parr chaudhari saahab kii aamdani seey dinn mein aeka dafe kissie tarah pett bhar sakane key liye aataa key alawa kapen kii gunjaish kahaan
kapen kii mahangaai key iss zamaane mein ghar kii paanchon auraton key shareer seey kapen jeern hocker yon gir rahey they
payja meey meey jaba paiband sanbhaalane kii taab naan rahee, markeen kaa aeka kurta-pyjama jaruri hoe gayaa, parr lachar they
girvi rakhane key liye ghar mein jaba kuchh bhee naan hoe,garib kaa aeka maatr sahaayak haye panjabi khaan
rahane kii jagah-bhar dekhkar vaha rupaya udhaar dey sakata haye
duss maheene pahale god key laken barkat key janm key samay pirbakhsh koo rupaye kii jaroor aaa pee
kaee dafe chaudhari paribakhsh ney bubber allie koo curge aur sood kii kisht naan milane parr apane haath key dundey seey rinee kaa darvaazaa peetate dekhaa thaa
unhein saahukaar aur rinee mein beach-bachauval bhee karna paan thaa
lekin lachar hoe jaane parr usee kii sharan lenny pee
khaan kii kisht naan dey sakane kii haalat mein apane ghar key daravaaje parr fazihat hoe jaane kii baat kaa khyaal curr chaudhari key roein khade hoe jaate
lekin jaba saavan mein barsaat pichhan gayee aur bajra bhee rupaye kaa teen sair milane lagaa,kisht denaa sambhav naan rahaa
bhaadon mein haalat aur bhee pareshani kii hoe gayee
bachchon kii maan kii tabiyat rose-rose girati jaa rahee thee
khaaya-piyaa usake pett mein naan thaharata
gehuun mushkil seey rupaye kaa sirf dhaaee sair milata
bazar mein taanbe kaa naam hii naheen raha gayaa
naahak ikanni nickle jaati haye
chaudhari koo dou rupaye mahangai-bhatte key mille; parr peshgi lete-lete tankhwah key dinn kewal chaar hii rupaye hisab mein nikale
bachche pichhale hafte lagbhag faake-seey they

lekin doosari or chaar bhookhe bachchon, unaki maan, doodh naan utar sakane key kaaran sookhakar kaanta hoe rahey god key bachche aur chalane-firane seey lachar apani zaeef maan kii bhookh seey bilbilati sooraten aakhon key saamane naach jaatin
dhakaten hue hriday seey way kahate jaate
maula sub dekhta haye, khair karega
malik ney peshgi dene seey saaf incar curr diyaa
parade kii aaanya seey bee bibi key baar-baar khuda kii kasam khaa yakeen.dilaane parr kii chaudhari baahar gaye hain,
pirbakhsh key shareer mein bijli-see daun gayee aur way bilkul nissattva hoe gaye, haath-pair sunn aur galaa khushk
uthane key bajaay aur bhee nirjeev hoe gayaa"
khaan key ghutane chhoo, apani musibat bataa way muaafi key liye khushamad karane lagey
bilkul babus aur lachari mein donon haath uthaa khuda seey khaan key liye duaa maang pirbakhsh ney kasam khaayi
khaan chaahe tou beshak usaki khaal utaarkar betch leey"
dyodhi seey parada hatane key saath hii, jaise chaudhari key jeevan kii door toot gayee
vaha dagmagakar zameen parr gir peyne

iss drishya koo dekh sakane kii taab chaudhari mein naan thee, parantu dwaar parr kheen bhee ney dekhaa-ghar kii lakiyan aur auraten parade key doosari or ghatati ghatana key aatank seey aangan key beechon-beach ikat‌thhee hoe kheen kaanp rahee theen
sahasa parada hutt jaane seey auraten aise sikud gayeen, jaise unake shareer kaa vastra kheench liyaa gayaa hoe
vaha parada hii tou ghar-bhar kii auraton key shareer kaa vastra thaa
unake shareer parr bache cheethen unake aeka-tihai anga dhankane mein bhee asamarth they
jahil bhee ney ghrina aur sharam seey aankhen fair leen
glani seey thook, parade koo aangan mein vapis fenk, kruddh nirasha mein usane ''lahaul bilaa..."
kahaa aur asafal laut gayaa
bhaya seey cheekhakar oat mein hoe jaane keliye bhaagati hui auraton parr dayaa curr bhee chhant gayee
chaudhari besudh peyne they
jaba unhein hosh aayaa, dyoi kaa parada aangan mein saamane paan thaa; parantu usey uthaakar phir seey latkaadene kaa samarthya unamen shesh naan thaa
shayed abb isaki aavashyakta bhee naan rahee thee
parada jiss bhaavana kaa avalamb thaa, vaha marr chuki thee
aeka dinn vahan key hakim ney mujh seey kahaa kii falaan makaan mein aeka rogi haye, vaha yahaan aaa naheen sakata, usey vaheen jaa curr dekho
vaha haath katane hii seey beemar padaa thaa aur issie kaaran baayan haath dikhaaya kartaa thaa
mujhe vaha dekh curr badaa dukh huaa
usa ney merrie aankhon kii karuna dekh curr kahaa, 'aap meraa dahina haath kataa dekh curr hii ashcharya aur dukh mein doobe hain
aggar aap merrie kahani sunenge tou aur bhee ashcharya karenge
snan key baad jaba main bhojan karane baithuungaa tou aap koo poori kahani sunaaunga
jaba main ney yeh taiyariyaan dekhin tou aeka dinn rotaa huaa apane pitaa key paas gayaa aur kahaa kii main bhee aap logon key saath misra koo jaanaa chaahata huun
mujhe badaa dukh huaa kintu main ney prayatn naan chhoda, aeka-aeka karke sabhi chachaon key paas gayaa kii merey pitaa seey mujhe bhee saath leey chalane kii sifarish karein
kyaa tum apane liye merey prem koo naheen jaanati
abb main ney jaanaa kii yeh sub usee dushta kii kartoot haye
vaha iss bechari key antim madira paatr mein vish ghol curr chully gaee
iss achaanak aaee musibat seey main badahwas hoe gayaa
main darr key maare kaanpane-saa lagaa kii abb bhagwan hii jaane mujh parr kyaa vipatti aae
phir main vahan rahane lagaa kintu kuchh karane mein meraa munn naheen lagata thaa
falatah merey paas kaa saaraa dhana dheere-dheere kharch hoe gayaa aur main ghar kaa saamaan betch curr gujara karane lagaa
jaba sub kuchh bick gayaa tou main ney socha kii iss muktajatit haar koo bechane key siva koee upaay naheen haye
sirf aeka vyaapaari haye joe ise pachas mudraon mein lene koo taiyar haye
main ney kahaa kii joe daam mille usee parr betch dou
dalal ney kahaa kii main tou dalal huun, ise bechnewala tou falaan dukaan parr baithaa haye, vahee ise pachas asharfi mein bechane koo raajee haye
kotwal ney mujhe pakadvaa bulaaya
merey incar karane parr usa ney mujhe itna pitwaya kii mujhe lagaa merrie zaan hii nickle jaayegi
isiliye main ney ghabra curr kaha diyaa kii yeh chori kaa haye
iss parr kotwal ney meraa dahina haath katwa diyaa
usa ney haar bhee malkhane mein jamaa karaa diyaa
main peedaa seey vyakul girata-padata apane ghar aayaa
naukar-chaakar pulis key darr seey bhaag gaye they
main kissie tarah khud hii apana kaam chalaata thaa
chauthe dinn bahut-seey puliswale merey ghar mein ghus aae aur mujhe pakad leey gaye
unake saath makaan malik bhee thaa aur vaha jauhari bhee jisane mujh parr chori kaa aarop lagaaya thaa
unhone mujhe bahut gaaliyan deen aur kahaa kii yeh haar shahar key hakim kaa haye, yeh teen varsh hue khou gayaa thaa, usee samay seey hakim kii putri bhee laapata haye
yeh kaha curr unhone mujhe russie seey baandha aur hakim key saamane pesh curr diyaa
phir main ney socha kii hakim adhik seey adhik mujhe marwa hii tou dega aur vaha bhee iss kasht, nirdhanta aur lajja key jeevan seey achchha haye
ataev main ney poori tarah bataaya kii kiss tarah pahali stree doosari koo merey paas laaee thee aur kiss tarah usa ney usey vish dey curr maar daalaa
main ney yeh bhee bataaya kii doosari stree kii laash kahaan gadee haye
hakim ney yeh sub suna curr thhandi saans bharee aur kahaa, 'bhagwan kii ichcha key aage sub loga vivash hain
main bhee vaha sub vinaypoorvak sweekaar kartaa hann joe usa kii ichcha seey huaa
tum parr joe kuchh musibat padee usa kaa mujhe atyant khed haye
abb tum meraa haal suno kii mujh parr kaise-kaise dukh padey
way donon striyaan merrie betiyaan theen
pahale joe tumhare paas gaee vaha merrie badee betty thee aur baad mein jise vaha leey gaee vaha usa kii chhoti bahan thee
vaha kuchh dinon baad achaanak marr gayaa
merrie betty kaee varsh taka vaidhavya kii dashaa mein bhee kahira mein rahee aur vahan usa ney tarah-tarah key dushkarm seekh liye
phir vaha yahaan aaa gaee
doosari betty joe usa seey chhoti thee aur joe tumhari baanhon mein murry badee samajhdaar aur sadacharini thee"
usa seey mujhe koee shikayat naheen hui lekin usa kii badee bahan ney usey bhee awara banane parr raajee curr liyaa
jaba chhoti murry tou main ney doosare dinn badee seey poochha kii tumhari bahan kahaan haye
main ney apani betty kii bahut khoj karaai kintu usa kaa kaheen pataa naheen chalaa
kuchh samay baad badee betty bhee, joe raat-dinn apane paap karm koo yaad karke rotee rahati thee, beemar hoe curr marr gaee
bete humm-tum donon hii durbhagya key maare hue hain"
yeh vrittaant sunaa curr hakim ney mujh seey kahaa
patra mein likhaa thaa kii tumhare pitaa kaa dehant hoe gayaa haye aur tum aaa curr zaydad mein apana hissa sanbhaalo
usa key marane parr merrie tabiyat vahan naan luggy
main faras desh chalaa gayaa
yeh bojh key maare maraa jaa rahaa haye
mazdoor koo aisaa sukhad sanga chhodane mein badaa dukh huaa
usane kahaa kii yeh merey liye badey durbhagya kii baat haye kii aisee haalat mein mujhe ghar seey nikala jaa rahaa haye, main iss nashe kii dashaa mein kiss prakaar apane ghar pahunch sakuungaa
kripaya raat bhar mujhe yahaan rahane kii anumati dein, yaheen kissie koney mein padaa rahoonga
yeh bhee hoe sakata haye kii way apane raag-rung mein vighn padate dekhkar nashe kii haalat mein aap kaa kuchh apamaan curr baithen
darwaja khulwa curr usane sub ulat-palatkar diyaa aur kaee aadamiyon koo giraftar curr liyaa
humm loga iss shahar mein kissie koo naheen jaanate
naan yahaan key maarg pahachaante hain"
hamein darr lugg rahaa haye kii humm idhar-udhar bhatakate hue saraay parr kaise pahunchenge
phir sambhav haye saraay kaa darwaja bund hoe gayaa hoe aur humm raat bhar galiyon mein bhatakate rahein
yeh bhee sambhav haye kii vahee kotwal gasht lagaata huaa aaa nikale aur humm logon koo bund curr dey
hamari dashaa badee dayaniya haye
sundari, tum dayaa karke anumati dou tou humm raat bhar key liye tumhare makaan mein kissie jagah padey rahein
mazdoor usaki agyanusar aeka kutiya koo kheench curr zubaida key paas laaya tou kutiya badey aart swar mein chillaane luggy
vaha dayaniya drishti seey zubaida kii taraf dekhti jaati thee aur usake pairon parr apana sir bhee ragadati jaati thee
zubaida ney usake iss anunaya parr kuchh dhyaan naan diyaa aur sadasad usey chabuk maarnaa shuru kiyaa
maarte-maarte jaba zubaida kaa dumm phool gayaa tou usane maarnaa bund curr diyaa
kutiya aur zubaida aeka-doosare koo dekhkar badey dukh key saath aansuu bahaane lageen
phir zubaida ney rumal seey kutiya key aansuu ponchhe aur usey pyaar karke uska munh chooma
zubaida ney iss kutiya koo bhee pahali kutiya kii bhaanti khoob maaraa, phir usaki aankhon mein aankhen daal curr roee aur usake aansuu ponchh curr aur munh choom curr pyaar kiyaa
zubaida ney usake vaadan kii badee prashansa kii aur kahaa kii abb buss karo, tumhare dukh key kaaran badee dukhad dashaa hoe rahee haye
ameena kii haalat itani kharaab hoe gaee thee kii vaha dagmagaane luggy aur girane-girane koo hui aur zubaida aur saafi ney daudkar usey sanbhaala
aeka fakir ney dheeme seey kahaa, kitane dukh kii baat haye kii humm itani adbhut ghatanaaen dekh rahey hain aur unake baare mein kissie seey poochh bhee naheen sakate
fakiron ney kahaa, humm mein seey koee bhee inn baaton koo naheen jaanata, humm loga aaj hii raat koo tumhare yahaan aaney seey kuchh hii pahale yahaan pahunche hain
mazdoor ney kahaa kii main bhagwan kii saugandh khaakar kahata huun kii mujhe kuchh bhee naheen maloom
abb sabako vishvaas hoe gayaa kii bhed khulane kii koee sambhavana naheen haye
aisee dashaa mein jore-jabardasti thheek naheen haye
aggar humm apana yeh vaadaa todenge tou yeh loga kyaa hamein beiman naheen kahengi
aur unhone hamaare liye aisaa kahaa tou hamaare liye doob marane kii baat hogi
aisaa huaa tou hamaare liye aur bhee lajja kii baat hoe jaayegi chaahe humm baad mein inhein kitna bhee dund dey dein
unhone incar curr diyaa kii hamara saahas naheen haye
sabane ekmat hocker kahaa kii jaffar koo chhodkar humm sabhi yeh baatein jaanana chaahate they aur hamane mazdoor seey kahaa thaa kii aapse yeh baatein poochhe
khalifa kshobh aur lajja key maare maraa jaa rahaa thaa, usey aise vyavhaar kii kyaa aashaa hoe sakati thee
mazdoor ney row curr kahaa, 'bhagwan key liye mujhe chhod dou
meraa koee dosh naheen haye
main tou inn logon key bahakaave mein aaa gayaa
kaane fakir jahaan jaayenge vaheen durbhagya laayenge

unamen seey aeka ney kahaa kii aisaa naheen haye; humm parr aisee vipattiyaan padeen joe naan kewal jaanane balki itihas mein likhe jaane yogya hain, unheen seey hamari aankhen jaati raheen aur unheen key kaaran hamane apani daadhi-moonchh aur bhavein mundwa daali aur fakir bunn gaye
bhale maanas ney socha kii makaan chhodkar kaheen jaa basoon kyonki main iss aadami key prati upkaar kartaa huun aur yeh mujh seey vair hii rakhe jaataa haye
baat karate-karate jaba way kuein key paas aae tou dusht manushya ney sant koo achaanak dhakka dekar kuein mein giraa diyaa aur swayam chupke seey makaan seey chalkar bhaag khadaa huaa
vaha apane jee mein badaa prasann thaa kii yeh aadami jisaki prasiddhi ney mujhe jalaa rakhaa haye khatm hoe gayaa
vaha isake ghar aayaa aur ise bahaane seey yahaan laakar kuein mein giraa diyaa
yadi humm loga isaki sahaayata naan karate tou yeh marr hii jaataa'
pahale ney kahaa, 'abb iska kyaa hoga'
doosare ney kahaa, 'rajkumari parr maimoon naamak jinn kaa putra dimdim aasakt haye aur vahee usake sir parr chadhaa rahata haye jisase rajkumari hamesha beemar aur badahwas rahati haye
aap tou samajh hii gaye honge kii main kyon yahaan aayaa huun'
maine apani kahani poori karke jinn seey kahaa kii usa neck badshah ney tou apane jaani dushman key saath yeh salook kiyaa aur tum mujh parr tanik bhee dayaa naheen karate
kintu merrie anunaya kaa usa parr koee prabhaav naan huaa
main apane koo bandar key roop mein paakar atyant dukhit huaa
mujhe yeh bhee maloom naan thaa kii main kahaan huun aur vahan seey meraa desh kiss disha mein aur kitni door haye
khair main dheere-dheere pahaad seey utar curr maidan mein aayaa aur vahan bhee maine saaraa pradesh nirjan dekhaa
atkal seey aeka or koo chalane lagaa
teesare ney mujhe samudra mein dubo dene kii salah dee
main unhein kaise bataata kii main kaun huun, zaan bachaa curr idhar-udhar bhaagane lagaa
anta mein sub or seey nirash hocker jahaaj key kaptan key paas gayaa aur usake paanvo parr lautane lagaa
maine uska daaman pakad liyaa aur aankhon mein aansuu bhar curr chinchiyaane lagaa jaise usase praan raksha kii bheekh maang rahaa huun
baat yeh haye kii hamara mantri haal hii mein marr gayaa haye
sardar haath jodkar bolaa, 'maharaj, kshama karein
shahzadi ney haath jodd curr kahaa, 'abba hujur, merrie koee galati naheen haye
yeh aeka badey badshah kaa putra haye aur jaadoo key kaaran iss dashaa koo pahuncha haye
phir bhee itani dair mein khoja jall curr bhasm hoe gayaa, badshah kaa munh jhulas gayaa aur merrie daaeen aankh mein aeka chingari parh gaee jisase merrie vaha aankh foot gaee
isaki aag kuchh kshanon mein mujhe bhasm curr degi
maine usey jalaakar bhasm tou curr diyaa lekin iss aag seey swayam koo mukt naheen curr paauungi
betty tum cassie baatein karati hoe"
badshah ney rokar kahaa
tumhare bagair humm loga kyaa karenge
dekhti naheen kii khoja marr gayaa haye, meraa munh jhulas gayaa haye aur yeh shahzada jiska tumane itna upkaar kiyaa haye daaeen aankh seey kaanaa hoe gayaa haye'
badshah iss tarah sir dhuna rahaa thaa aur main bhee row-peat rahaa thaa kii shahzadi ney chillana shuru kiyaa, 'haay jalee, haay murry
aur dekhate hii dekhate vaha bhee jall curr jinn kii tarah raakh kaa dher hoe gaee
doosare fakir ney aansuu bahaate hue zubaida seey kahaa kii haye sundari,
usa samay mujhe jitna dukh huaa vaha varnan key baahar haye

main soch rahaa thaa kii aggar main bandar tou kyaa kutta bhee hoe jaataa aur aajeevan vaisa hii rahata tou bhee iss baat seey achchi baat hoti kii aisee gunavati rajkumari, jisane mujh parr itna ehsan kiyaa, iss tarah zaan seey haath dhoye
badshah bhee apani betty key dukh mein itna roya-peeta kii behosh hoe gayaa
mujhe bhaya lagane lagaa kii aisaa naan hoe kii iss daarun dukh seey usaki zaan chully jaae
chaaron aur hahakar honey lagaa aur rajmahal mein pralay kaa-saa drishya upasthit hoe gayaa
saare nagar mein yeh samachar fail gayaa aur harr jagah rona-peetna mutch gayaa aur hahakar key sivaay kuchh naheen sunai diyaa
una logon ney saat dinn taka shahzadi key liye shoke kiyaa aur unake desh mein maatam kii joe joe rasmein hoti theen sabhi poori keen

nagar mein bhee mujhe chain naan milaa
nagar nivasi shahzadi key shoke mein vihwal they aur mujhe hii usaki mrityu kaa kaaran samajh curr jahaan mujhe pahachaante mujhe maarne key liye jhapatate they
maine vivash hocker apani zaan bachaane key liye daadhi, moonchhen aur bhavein mundwa daalin aur fakiron key- seey vastra pahan liye aur vahan seey chala diyaa
nagar seey baahar aakar bhee main pashchaattap kii aag mein barabar jalata rahaa aur apane jeevan koo dhikkarta rahaa jisake kaaran dou-dou rupasi rajkumariyan kaal kavalit huin

aap bhee usaki lambi-chauin baaton key dhokhe mein aaa jaate hain

bechaare sanad key naam roya karate they, yahaan usaki koee jarurat naheen thee
mahaashay que naastik they, huxley key upaasak, mugger aajkal unaki dharmanishtha dekh curr mandir key pujari koo padchyut hoe jaane kii shanka luggy rahati thee
chaliye taya hoe gayaa, feeled bunn gaee, khel shuru hoe gayaa aur gend kissie daftar key apprentices kii tarah thokaren khaane lagaa
lekin doosari or key khilaayi iss bateen hui lahar koo iss tarah roque lete they kii maano lohe kii deewaar haye
haanfte-haanfte bedam hoe gaye, lekin haar-jeet kaa nirnay naan hoe sakaa
pathikon koo naale mein seey chala curr aanaa pataan thaa
lekin kuchh tou naale mein keechan thaa aur kuchh usaki chaain itani oonchi thee kii gaanee oopar naan chachay sakati thee
lekin bojh adhik thaa aur bail kamjor
gaanee oopar koo naan chateen aur chateen bhee tou kuchh door chakar phir khisak curr neeche pahunch jaati
kisan baar-baar jore lagaata aur baar-baar jhunjhala curr bailon koo maartaa, lekin gaanee ubharane kaa naam naan letee
bechara idhar-udhar nirash hoe curr taaktaa mugger vahan koee sahaayak najar naan aataa
bee aapatti mein fansaa huaa thaa
khilaaniyon ney bhee usako dekhaa mugger bund aankhon seey, jinamen sahaanubhooti naan thee
unamen swarth thaa, mudd thaa, mugger udaartaa aur vatsalya kaa naam bhee naan thaa lekin
thithak gayaa

nehru naheen maane, buss issie bhool key kaaran hamein chean seey pitna paan aur chean ney hamari seema kii 40,000 varg gaj bhoomi parr kabja curr liyaa
15 disambar 1950 koo praat:kaal 9.37 parr iss mahapurush kaa 76 varsh kii ayu mein nidhan hoe gayaa jisaki kshatipurti honah dushkar haye
dagoon aeka kamchor aur aalsi lakaan thaa
dagoon key saath aeka bee pareshani thee kii usey aksar burey sapane hii aatey they
aur jaba bhee koee buraa sapana aataa thaa, vaha sapana hakikat bunn jaataa thaa
aeka dinn dagoon koo sapana aataa haye kii kuchh loga nava vivaahit dampatti aur barat koo loot rahey hain
aur unase marpeet bhee curr rahey hain
taba sapane vaalaa vakaya sach mein ghatit hoe jaataa haye
iss ghatana key kuchh dinon baad aeka raat dagoon koo sapana aataa haye kii mohalle meey raha rahee chaudharayan kaa nayaa makaan grihpravesh key dinn jall curr aakan hoe jaataa haye
vaheen parr sapane kii baat dagoon fauran apani maan seey aur chaudharayan seey kaha detaa haye
aur phir usey sapana aataa haye kii sonpur mein bhookamp aayaa haye aur wahan maujood sabhi vyakti marr gaye hain
bahut khojane parr bhee unhein paani naheen milata, aisaa lagata haye maano pyaas seey zaan hii nickle jaayegi
tenaliram jaba ayu mein yuva they tabhi unake key pitaa garalaapati ramayya kii mrityu hoe gayee
aur aeka baar phir baaki mantri apana saa munh leey curr raha jaate hain

yeh suna mullah naraz hoe gaye ,” jinn logon koo yeye bhee naheen pataa kii main kyaa bolane vaalaa huun merrie unake saamane bolane kii koee ichcha naheen haye . “ aur aisaa kaha curr voe chaley gaye .
“bahut achche jaba aap pahale seey hii jaanate hain tou bhalaa dubara bataa curr main aapka samay kyon barvaad karuun ”, aur aisaa khete hue mullah wahan seey nickle gaye .

vahee nadee kaa kinara, vahee vriksh kaa kunj, vahee chandaa kaa chhota-saa sunder ghar usaki aankhon mein fira kartaa; aur vaha paudha jise una donon ney mill curr seencha thaa, usamen tou maano usake praan hii basate they

kewal maataa jee unakaa krodh shaant karna jaanati theen; parr vaha daftar mein kaise aateen
bechara kazaki usee vakt merey dekhate-dekhate nikaal diyaa gayaa
uska ballam, chapras aur saafaa chheen liyaa gayaa aur usey dakkhane seey nickle jaane kaa nadiri hukm sunaa diyaa
aaha
usa vakt meraa aisaa jee chaahata thaa kii merey paas soney kii lankaa hoti, tou kazaki koo dey detaa aur baabu jee koo dikhaa detaa kii aapke nikaal dene seey kazaki kaa baal bhee baanka naheen huaa
jaba vaha chapras kholane lagaa, tou usake haath kaanp rahey they aur aankhon seey aansuu baha rahey they
aur iss saare upadrav kii jajang vaha komal vastu thee, joe merrie god mein munh chhipaaye aise chain seey baithi hui thee, maano maataa kii god mein hoe
main chupchaap khaan apane aansuon key wegg koo saaree shakti seey dabaa rahaa thaa
main dauaan huaa ghar gayaa, lekin ammaan jee koo kuchh kahane key badale bilakh-bilakh curr rone lagaa
kisane maaraa
baabu jee ney kuchh kahaa haye
chup raho betaa, abb tum unake paas kabhi mutt jaanaa
maine bee mushkil seey aavaaj sambhaal curr kahaa —kazaki... ammaan ney samajha, kazaki ney maaraa haye; bolin , achchha, aaney dou kazaki koo, dekho, khein-khein nikalva detee huun
baabu jee ney usey nikaal diyaa haye; uska saafaa, ballam chheen liyaa , chapras bhee leey lii
ammaan , yeh tumhare baabu jee ney bahut buraa kiyaa
vaha bechara apane kaam mein itna chaukas rahata haye
phir usey kyon nikala
maine kahaa —aaj usey dair hoe gayee thee
isaliye baabu jee ney bechaare koo nikaal diyaa , chapras, saafaa, ballam, sub chheen liyaa
abb bechara kyaa karega
bhookhon marr jaayaga

khaana tou maine khaa liyaa , bachche shoke mein khaana naheen chhoten, khaas curr jaba rabin bhee saamane hoe; mugger bee raat taka peyne-peyne sochata rahaa , merey paas rupaye hotey, tou aeka laakh rupaye kazaki koo dey detaa aur kahata , baabu jee seey kabhi mutt bolna
bechara bhookhon marr jaayaga
abb kyaa karega aaa curr
jaanata thaa kii kazaki nikaal diyaa gayaa haye, abb usey yahaan aaney kii koee jarurat naheen rahee
ekaek mujhe khayal aayaa kii kazaki bhookhon marr rahaa hoga
tum bhookhe hoge, aaj kyaa khaaya hoga
bolaa —  bhaiya, kyaa rookhi hii rotiyaan khaauunga
daal, namak, ghee , aur tou kuchh naheen haye
main apani bhool parr bahut lajjit huaa
sach tou haye, bechara rookhi rotiyaan kaise khaayga
lekin namak, daal, ghee kaise laauun
abb tou ammaan chauke mein hongi
abb yeye teen-teen cheejen kaise laaoonga
ammaan seey maangoonga, tou kabhi naan dengi
aeka-aeka paise key liye tou ghanton rulaati hain, itani saaree cheejen kyon dene lageen
abb bhee vahee haalat hoti tou shayed itna fakemast naan rahata
ammaan mujhe pyaar tou bahut karati theen, parr paise kaa naam sunate hii unaki tyoriyaan badal jaati theen
merey paas kitaaben naan theen
kazaki , tumhari ammaan jee tumko maarengi, kahengi , kazaki ney fusala curr mangvaa liye honge
sitpita curr bolaa —  kissie koo tou naheen diyaa
aanewaali vipatti key bhaya seey praan sookh rahey they

yahaan taka kii yeh bhee kahane kii himmat naan pateen thee kii bigati kyon hoe, aataa tou dwaar parr rakhaa huaa haye, aur naan uthaa curr laate hii banata thaa, maano kriya-shakti hii lupt hoe gayee hoe, maano pairon mein hilane kii samarthya hii naheen
ammaan ney dwaar parr kaee baar pukara; mugger kazaki chalaa gayaa thaa
mujhe tou bechaare parr bee dayaa aatee haye
naan-jaane bechaare key ghar mein kuchh khaane koo haye kii naheen
rupaye laayi thee kii dey doongi; parr naan-jaane kahaan chalaa gayaa
mugger andhera hoe gayaa aur kazaki kaa kaheen pataa naheen
diye jall gaye, raaste mein sannata chhaa gayaa; parr kazaki naan aayaa
main rotaa huaa ghar aayaa
ammaan jee ney poochha—kyon rote hoe, betaa
kyaa kazaki naheen aayaa
main aur jore seey rone lagaa
ammaan jee ney mujhe chhaati seey lagaa liyaa
mujhe aisaa maloom huaa kii unakaa bhee kanth gadgad hoe gayaa haye
unhone kahaa —betaa, chup hoe jaao, main cull kissie harkaare koo bhej curr kazaki koo bulavaaungi
usey bhaya thaa kii vaha kaheen bhaag gayaa haye

unhein yeh bhee gyaat naheen hotaa kii kaun-see baat unhein vickle curr rahee haye, kaun-saa kaanta unake hriday mein khatak rahaa haye, kyon baar-baar unhein rona aataa haye, kyon way munn maare baithe rahate hain, kyon khelane mein jee naheen lagata
merrie bhee yahee dashaa thee
kabhi ghar mein aataa, kabhi baahar jaataa, kabhi sasak parr jaa pahunchata
aankhen kazaki koo dhuun rahee theen
vaha kahaan chalaa gayaa
mujhe aisaa zaan paan kii vaha yeh baat suna curr bahut chintit hoe gayeen
isake baad dou-teen dinn taka kazaki naan dikhalaayi diyaa
main bhee abb usey kuchh-kuchh bhoolane lagaa
bachche pahale jitna prem karate hain, baad koo utane hii nishthur bhee hoe jaate hain
jiss khilaune parr praan dete hain, usee koo dou-chaar dinn key baad patak curr foun bhee daalate hain
aurat ney row curr kahaa —bahuu jee, jiss dinn seey aapke paas seey aataa leey curr gaye hain, usee dinn seey beemar peyne hain
buss, bhaiya-bhaiya kiyaa karate hain
bhaiya hii mein unakaa munn basaa rahata haye
chaunk-chaunk curr 'bhaiya
bhaiya
' kahate hue dwaar kii or dauten hain
naan jaane unhein kyaa hoe gayaa haye, bahuu jee
aeka dinn mujhase kuchh kahaa naan sunaa, ghar seey chala diye aur aeka gully mein chhip curr bhaiya koo dekhate rahey
jaba bhaiya ney unhein dekh liyaa, tou bhaage
tumhare paas aatey hue lajaate hain
aaj sabere uthhe aur talab kii or chaley gaye
bahut kahati rahee, baahar mutt jaao, havaa lugg jaayagi
mugger naan maane
maare kamjori key pair kaanpane lagate hain, mugger talab mein ghus curr yeye kamalgatte toun laaye
vaha bahut dubla hoe gayaa thaa, maloom hotaa thaa, buun hoe gayaa haye
haraa-bharaa peyne sookh curr thuunthaa hoe gayaa thaa

kazaki rotaa huaa pitaa jee key pairon parr gir paan; mugger shayed merey bhaagya mein donon sukh bhogana naan likhaa thaa , munnu milaa, tou kazaki chhoota; kazaki aayaa tou munnu haath seey gayaa aur aisaa gayaa kii aaj taka usake jaane kaa doo:kha haye
jhabare ney iss maidan mein aatey hii ulat curr munnu kii gardan dabaa dee
bechaare munnu key munh seey aavaaj taka naan nikali
jaba posiyon ney shore machaaya, tou main dauaan
dekhaa, tou munnu maraa paan haye aur jhabare kaa kaheen pataa naheen

ise dekhkar anayas hii usa chhote jeev kaa smaran hoe aayaa, joe iss lataa kii saghan haritima mein chhipkar baithata thaa aur phir merey nikat pahunchate hii kandhe parr koodkar mujhe chaunka detaa thaa
taba mujhe cully kii khoj rahati thee, parr aaj usa laghupran kii khoj haye
parantu vaha tou abb taka iss sonjuhi kii jajang mein mitty hocker mill gayaa hoga
hamaare bechaare purkhe naan garoon key roop mein aaa sakate hain, naan mayur key, naan huns key
unhein pitarpaksh mein hamse kuchh paane key liye kaak bankar hii avatirna honah pataan haye
itna hii naheen hamaare doorasth priyajanon koo bhee apane aaney kaa madhu sandesh inke karkash swar mein hii denaa pataan haye
doosari or humm kauva aur kaanv-kaanv karane koo avamaanana key arth mein hii prayukt karate hain
nikat jaakar dekhaa, gilhari kaa chhota-saa bachcha haye joe sambhavatah ghonsale seey gir paan haye aur abb kauve jisamen sulabh aahar khoj rahey hain
kakdvaya kii chonchon key dou ghaav usa laghupran key liye bahut they, atah vaha nishchesht-saa gamale seey chipta paan thaa
sabane kahaa, kauve kii chonch kaa ghaav lagane key baad yeh butch naheen sakata, atah ise aise hii rahane diyaa jaave
rui kii patali batti doodh seey bhigokar jaise-taise usake nanhe seey munh mein lagaai parr munh khul naan sakaa aur doodh kii buunden donon or dhulak gaeen
usee beach mujhe motor durghatana mein aahat hocker kuchh dinn aspatal mein rehna paan

sub usey kaju dey aatey, parantu aspatal seey lautkar jaba maine usake jhoole kii safaai kii tou usamen kaju bharey mille, jinase gyaat hotaa thaa kii vaha una dinon apana priya khaadya kitna cumm khaata rahaa
gilhariyon key jeevan kii avadhi dou varsh seey adhik naheen hoti, atah gillu kii jeevan yatra kaa anta aaa hii gayaa
dinn bhar usane naan kuchh khaaya naan baahar gayaa

raat mein anta kii yaatana mein bhee vaha apane jhoole seey utarkar merey bistar parr aayaa aur thhande panjon seey merrie vahee ungali pakakar haath seey chipak gayaa, jise usane apane bachpan kii maranasanna sthiti mein pakaan thaa
parantu prabhaat kii pratham kiran key sparsh key saath hii vaha kissie aur jeevan mein jaagane key liye sou gayaa
kabhi-kabhi beach mein munn-mutaav hoe jaataa haye, aur aina vivaah key muhurt parr varr-vadhu mein seey koee bhee dikhaai naheen detaa
una dinon yeh jagah sunsan pee rahati haye
naan koee bhee naan koee ghoan-gaanee
bhikhaari bhee khaali haath laut jaate hain
akeli baithi thee aur suunii aankhon seey girje koo dekh rahee thee
park mein yahee aeka mushkil haye
itane khule mein sub apane-apane mein bund baithe rahate hain
aap kissie key paas jaa curr santvana key dou shabd bhee naheen kaha sakate
sasak key donon taraf loga khein they aur meraa dill dhuk-dhuk curr rahaa thaa kii kaheen sabke saamane meraa paanv naan fisal peyne
isiliye way aadamiyon kii duniya mein sabse adhik udas rahate hain
kissie cheej kaa aadee naan hoe paanaa, isase baan aur koee durbhagya naheen

way loga joe aakhir taka aadee naheen hoe paate yaa tou ghonon kii tarah udaseen hoe jaate hain, yaa merrie tarah dhoop key aeka tuken kii khoj mein aeka bench seey doosari bench kaa chakkar lagaate rahate hain

humm itane lalchi aur irshyalu hoe jaate hain kii hamein yeh sochana bhee asahaniya lagata haye kii kabhi aisaa samay rahaa hoga, jaba vaha hamaare bagair jeetaa thaa, pyaar kartaa thaa, sotaa-jaagata thaa

isiliye hamein doosaron key marane parr joe dukh hotaa haye, vaha thoan-bahut swarthi qism kaa dukh haye, kyonki hamein lagata haye kii isake saath hamara aeka hissa bhee hamesha key liye khatm hoe gayaa haye
barason pahale kii goonj, joe usake angon seey nickle curr merrie aatma mein buss jaati thee, abb kaheen naan thee

main raat-bhar usake sirhaane baithi rahee aur merey haath murda hoe curr usaki deh parr peyne rahey... mujhe yeh bhayaanak-saa lagaa kii humm donon key beach joe khalipan aaa gayaa thaa, vaha main kissie seey naheen kaha sakati
jee haan-apane vakeel seey bhee naheen, jinhen main arse seey jaanati thee
way samajhe, main sathiya gaee huun
kaisa khatka
jee haan... usane prashnon kii jhee lagaa dee aur main thee kii aeka ediot kii tarah unakaa munh taakati rahee
aur taba mujhe pahali baar pataa chalaa kii alag honey key liye court, kachahari jaanaa jaruri naheen haye
main kabhi halki naheen hoti

naheen jee, loga dukh naheen baantate, sirf faisalaa karate hain - kaun doshi haye aur kaun nirdosh... mushkil yeh haye, joe aeka vyakti aapaki dukhti rugg koo sahee-sahee pahachaan sakata haye, usee seey humm alag hoe jaate hain... isiliye main apane muhalle koo chhon curr shahar key iss ilaake mein aaa gaee, yahaan mujhe koee naheen jaanata
pahale jaba koee iss tarah kii baat kahata thaa, tou main beach sasak parr kheen hoe jaati thee

jee haan, mujhe yeh lagata thaa kii jaba taka main unhein yeh sach naheen bataa doongi, taba taka usa raat key baare mein kuchh naheen kaha sakoongi, jaba pahali baar merey bheetar khatka huaa thaa aur barason baad yeh ichcha hui thee kii main doosare kamare mein bhaag jaauun, jahaan merey maan-baap sote they... lekin vaha kamra khaali thaa
jee, maine kaheen paan thaa kii beyne honey kaa matlab haye kii aggar aap aadhi raat koo jaag jaaen aur kitna hii kyon naan cheekhen-chillaaen, doosare kamare seey koee naheen aayega
vaha hamesha khaali rahega

lekin jaba logon key saath aisaa hotaa haye, tou kissie koo koee khabar naheen hoti... usa raat key baad doosare dinn main saare shahar mein akeli ghoomati rahee aur kissie ney merrie taraf dekhaa bhee naheen... jaba main pahali baar iss park mein aaee thee, issie bench parr baithi thee, jiss parr aap baithe hain
abb jaldi padee haye kii loga eidgah kyon naheen chalate
inhein grihasthi kii chintaon seey kyaa prayojan
sevaiyon key liye doodh or shakkar ghar mein haye yaa naheen, inki balaa seey, yeye tou seveyaan khaayenge
vaha kyaa jaanen kii abbajan kyon badahwas chaudhari kayamali key ghar daude jaa rahey hain
unhein kyaa khabar kii chaudhari aankhen badal lein, tou yeh saaree eed muharram hoe jaay
unaki apani jebon mein tou kuber kaa dhana bharaa huaa haye
baar-baar jeb seey apana khajaana nikalkar ginate hain aur khush hocker phir rakh lete hain
kisane bulaaya thaa iss nigodi eed koo
iss ghar mein uska kaam naheen, lekin hamid
yeh loga kyon itna dheere-dheere chala rahey hain
tabhi tum bahut jaanate hoe ajii hajrat, yeh chori karate hain
shahar key jitane chor-daku hain, sub inase mille rahate hain
raat koo yeye loga choron seey tou kahate hain, chori karo aur aap doosare muhalle mein jaakar 'jaagate raho
tabhi inn logon key paas itane roopaye aatey hain
bees rupaya maheena paate hain, lekin pachas roopaye ghar bhejate hain
inhein kaun pakadega
pakadane vaale tou yeh loga khud hain, lekin allah, inhein sajaa bhee khoob detaa haye
hamid- rakhe raho
kyaa merey paas paise naheen hain
hamid- mithaai kaun badee nemat haye
kitab mein isaki kitni buraaiyaan likhi hain
mahmoud- humm samajhate hain, isaki chalaki
jaba hamaare saare paise kharch hoe jaayenge, tou hamein lalcha-lalchaakar khaayga
dekho, sub kitane lalchi hain
usa parr kahate haye, merey saath khelo
meraa yeh kaam karo
abb aggar kissie ney koee kaam karane koo kahaa, tou poochuungaa
khaayen mithaaiyaan, aap munh sadegaa, phode-funsiyaan nikalengi, aap hii jabaan chatori hoe jaayagi
taba ghar seey paise churaayenge aur maar khaayenge
inn logon key khilaune parr kaun inhein duaayen dega
main bhee inase mijaz dikhaaunga
khelein khilaune aur khaayen mithaaiyaan
mai naheen khelata khilaune, kissie kaa mijaz kyon sahuun
yeh naheen kii aeka paise kii revadiyaan leen, tou chidhaa-chidhaakar khaane lagey
tou bataate kyon naheen, kai paise kaa haye
hamid haye badaa chalak
isiliye badmash ney apane paise bachaa rakhe they
mohsin paraast hoe gayaa, parr mahmoud ney kumuk pahunchaai- aggar bachcha pakad jaayan tou adalat mein bandhe-bandhe firenge
taba tou vakeel saahab key pairon padenge
mahmoud ney aeka jore lagaaya- vakeel saahab kursi-mez parr baithenge, tumhara chimta tou bawarchikhane mein jameen parr padaa rahega
ameena ney chhaati peat lii
yeh kaisa besamajh ladka haye kii dopahar huaa, kuchh khaaya naan piyaa
laaya kyaa, chimta
saare melle mein tujhe aur koee cheej naan millie, joe yeh lohe kaa chimta uthaa laaya
purani jitani baatein hain, sub achchi, nayee jitani baatein hain, sub kharaab
zaydad key vishay mein jamindar saahab naye-naye dafon kaa vyavhaar karate they, vahan apana koee akhtiyar naan thaa, lekin samajik prathaon key kattar pakshapaati they
santsaran badey teekhe, gussever aadami they, naak parr makkhi naan baithane dete
dhoortata aur chhal-kapat seey hii unhone zaydad paida kii thee aur usee koo safal jeevan kaa mantra samajhate they
unaki patni unase bhee dou angul oonchi thee
majaal kyaa kii bahuu apani andheri kothri key dwaar parr khadee hoe jaay, yaa kabhi chhat parr tahal sakey
daal mein namak kaa jaraa tej hoe jaanaa unhein dinn-bhar bakane key liye kaafee bahaana thaa
abb kaahe koo aabaru rahegi
munder parr khadee hocker jhaankati haye
merrie ladki aisee deeda-diler hoti tou galaa ghont detee
naan-jaane isake desh mein kaun loga basate hain
gahane naheen pahanati
jaba dekho nangi-buchchi bunny baithi rahati haye
yeh bhee koee achche lachchan hain
tujhe bhee chaandani mein sonaa achchha lagata haye, kyon
tuu bhee apane koo mard kahega
vaha mard kaisa kii aurat usake kahane mein naan rahey
dinn-bhar ghar mein ghusa rahata haye
munh mein jabaan naheen haye
samajhaata kyon naheen
maan- maanegi kyon naheen, tuu mard haye kii naheen
mard vaha chaahiye kii kadee nigah seey dekhe tou aurat kaanp uthhe
maan- merrie usey kyaa parwa
samajhati hogi, budhiya chaar dinn mein marr jaayagi, taba main malkin hoe hii jaaoongi
sitasaran- aaj aggar bolin tou main bhee bigad jaaoonga
kahaan tou leela koo rote dekh usaki aankhen sajal hoe jaati theen, kahaan abb usey udas aur shoke-magn dekhkar jhunjhala uthataa
sahasa sitasaran ney aakar kahaa- kyaa dinn-bhar rotee hii rahogi
jaraa kapade tou badal dalo, aadami bunn jaao
yeh kyaa tumane apani gata banaa rakhee haye
leela- tum jaao apani mahfil mein baitho, tumhen merrie kyaa fikr padee haye
sitasaran- kyaa duniya mein aur kissie key ladke naheen marate
tumhare hii sir yeh musibat aayee haye
sitasaran- merey saath bhee tou tumhara kuchhar kattaavya haye
sitasaran- main abb iss manhusat kaa anta curr denaa chaahata huun
aggar tumhara apane dill parr kaabu naheen haye tou meraa bhee apane dill parr kaabu naheen haye
main abb jindagi-bhar maatam naheen manaa sakata
sitasaran- meraa ghar rone key liye naheen haye
leela koo aisaa krodh aayaa kii issie samay chalkar iss kulta koo aadey haathon luun, aisaa dutkaaruun kii vaha bhee yaad karey, khade-khade nikaal duun
vaha patni-bhaav joe bahut dinon seey sou rahaa thaa, jaag uthaa aur usey vickle karane lagaa
parr usane jabt kiyaa
wegg seey daudati hui trishnaaen akasmaat naan rokie jaa sakati theen
vaha ulate paanv bheetar laut aayee aur munn koo shaant karke sochane luggy- vaha roop-rung mein, haav-bhaav mein, nakhe-tille mein usa dushta kii barabari naheen curr sakati
bilkul chaand kaa tukada haye, anga-anga mein sphurti bharee hui haye, pore-pore mein mudd jhalak rahaa haye
usaki aankhon mein kitni trishna haye, trishna naheen, balki jwala
padosiyon seey usey chidh thee, isaliye kii way angeethi seey aag nikaal leey jaate they
yeh amagalamurthy kahaan seey aaa pahunchi, maloom naheen, daanaa bhee mayassar hoga yaa naheen
rusht hoe curr poochha-kyaa haye jee, kyaa kahate hoe
jaanate naheen, humm iss samay pooja parr rahate hain
budhiya naan jaane kaba taka jiyegi
dou-teen beeghe oosar kyaa dey diyaa, maano moll leey liyaa haye
baghaari daal key binaa rotiyaan naheen utaratin
jitna rupaya isake pett mein jhonk chuke, utane seey tou abb taka gaanv moll leey lete
jumman ney dhrishtata key saath uttar diyaa-rupaye kyaa yahaan falate hain
khaala bigad gayeen, unhone panchaayat karane kii dhamki dee
kissie ney tou yon hii oopari munn seey huun-haan karke taal diyaa, aur kissie ney iss anyaay parr jamaane koo gaaliyan deen
kahaa-kabr mein paanv latake hue hain, aaj marey cull doosara dinn, parr havas naheen maanati
abb tumhen kyaa chaahiye
rotty khaao aur allah kaa naam low
tumhen abb kheti-baari seey kyaa kaam haye
aeka koney mein aag sulag rahee thee
khaala ney chilla curr kahaa-arey allah key bande
panchon kaa naam kyon naheen bataa detaa
kuchh mujhe bhee tou maloom hoe
jumman ney krodh seey kahaa-abb iss vakt meraa munh naan khulvaao
tumhari bunn padee haye, jise chaaho, punch bado
ramdhan mishra aur jumman key doosare virodhiyon ney budhiya koo munn mein bahut kosa
naan maloom kaba kii kasar yeh nikaal rahaa haye
jumman key chitt mein mitra kii kutilata aathon pahar khatka karati thee
usey harr ghadee yahee chinta rahati thee kii kissie tarah badala lene kaa avsar mille
jumman koo bhee badala lene kaa avsar jald hii mill gayaa
chaudharain aur kariman mein iss vishay parr aeka dinn khoob hii vaad-vivaad huaa
donon deviyon ney shabd-bahulya kii nadee bahaa dee
vyangya, vakrokti, anyokti aur upama aadi alankaron mein baatein huin
maare krodh key unhone marey hue bail parr aur durre lagaaye aur kosane lagey-abhaage
tujhe marna hii thaa, tou ghar pahunch curr martaa
sasura beach raaste hii mein marr rahaa
abb gaadi kaun kheenche
iss tarah saahu jee khoob jaley-bhune
sahuain ney jaba yeh buri sunavani sunee, taba pahale tou royee, phir algu chaudhari koo gaaliyan dene luggy-nigode ney aisaa kulachhani bail diyaa kii janm bhar kii kamai lutt gayee
algu jaba apane bail key daam maangate taba saahu aur sahuain, donon hii jhallaaye hue kutte kii tarah chadh baithate aur und-bund bakane lagate-vaah
yahaan tou saare janm kii kamai lutt gayee, satyanash hoe gayaa, inhein daamon kii padee haye
murda bail diyaa thaa, usa parr daam maangane chaley hain
aankhon mein dhool jhonk dee, satyanashi bail galey baandh diyaa, hamein niraa ponga hii samajh liyaa haye
humm bhee baniye key bachche hain, aise buddhu kaheen aur honge
pahale jaa curr kissie gadahe mein munh dhou aao, taba daam lena
naan jee maanata hoe, tou hamara bail khol leey jaao
maheena bhar key badale dou maheena joth low
aur kyaa loge
aeka baar vaha bhee garam padey
saahu jee bigad curr laathi dhoondhane ghar mein chaley gaye
prashnottar hotey-hotey hathapai kii naubat aaa pahunchi
isake pratikool dou sabhya mool key atirikt samajhu koo dund bhee denaa chaahate they, jisase phir kissie koo pashuon key saath aisee nirdayata karane kaa saahas naan hoe
ramdhan mishra boley-samajhu ney bail koo zaan-boojh curr maaraa haye, ataev usase dund lena chaahiye
balki vaha bahudha badey jore seey usaki ninda aur tiraskar kiyaa karate they
yahee kaaran thaa kii gaanv kii lalanaaen unaki nindak theen
koee-koee tou unhein apana shatru samajhane mein bhee sankoch naan karati theen
swayam unaki patni koo hii iss vishay mein unase virodh thaa
lalbihari khaane baithaa, tou daal mein ghee naan thaa, bolaa-daal mein ghee kyon naheen chhoda
lalbihari jore seey bolaa-abhee parason ghee aayaa haye
itna jald uthh gayaa
jiss tarah sookhi lakadi jaldi seey jall uthati haye-usee tarah kshudha seey bawla manushya jaraa-jaraa see baat parr tinak jaataa haye
lalbihari koo bhawaj kii yeh dhithai bahut buri maloom hui, tinak curr bolaa-maike mein tou chaahe ghee kii nadee bahati hoe
anandi munh fair curr bollie-haathi maraa bhee, tou nau laakh kaa
vahan itna ghee nitya naaee-kahaar khaa jaate hain
lalbihari jall gayaa, thaali uthaakar palat dee, aur bolaa-jee chaahata haye, jeebh pakad curr kheench luun
anandi koo bhee krodh aaa gayaa
munh laal hoe gayaa, bollie-vaha hotey tou aaj iska majaa chakhaate
jaba jee chaahata, usa parr haath saaf curr liyaa kartaa thaa
khadaauun uthaakar anandi kii or jore seey fenki, aur bolaa-jisake guman parr bhooli hui hoe, usey bhee dekhuungaa aur tumhen bhee
krodh key maare havaa seey hilate patte kii bhaanti kaanpati hui apane kamare mein aaa curr khadee hoe gayee
ekant huaa, tou lalbihari ney kahaa-bhaiya, aap jaraa bhaabhi koo samajha deejiyega kii munh sambhaal curr baatcheet kiyaa karein, naheen tou aeka dinn unnerth hoe jaayega
lalbihari-vaha badey ghar kii betty hain, tou humm bhee koee kurmi-kahaar naheen hain
lalbihari ney kahaa-kuchh bhee naheen
maike key saamane humm logon koo kuchh samajhatin hii naheen
vaha bharee baithi thee
yeh hajrat bhee kuchh teekhe they
anandi kii tyoriyon parr bull parh gaye, jhunjhalaahat key maare badan mein jwala-see dahak uthee
bollie-jisane tumse yeh aag lagaayi haye, usey paauun, tou munh jhulas duun
anandi-kyaa kahuun, yeh merey bhaagya kaa fair haye
naheen tou ganvaar chhokara, jisako chaprasgiri karane kaa bhee shaoor naheen, mujhe khadaauun seey maar curr yon naan akadata
anandi-parason tumhare laadale bhaai ney mujhase maans pakaane koo kahaa
ghee haandi mein paav-bhar seey adhik naan thaa
vaha sub maine maans mein daal diyaa
jaba khaane baithaa tou kahane lagaa-daal mein ghee kyon naheen haye
buss, issie parr merey maike koo buraa-bhalaa kahane lagaa-mujhase naan rahaa gayaa
maine kahaa kii vahan itna ghee tou naaee-kahaar khaa jaate hain, aur kissie koo zaan bhee naheen padata
buss itani see baat parr iss anyaayi ney mujh parr khadaauun fenk maaree
yadi haath seey naan roque luun, tou sir futt jaaye
usee seey poochho, maine joe kuchh kahaa haye, vaha sach haye yaa jhooth
shreekanth kii aankhen laal hoe gayeen
boley-yahaan taka hoe gayaa, iss chhokare kaa yeh saahas
praatahkaal apane baap key paas jaakar boley-daadaa, abb iss ghar mein meraa nibah naan hoga
shreekanth-isaliye kii mujhe bhee apani maan-pratishtha kaa kuchh vichaar haye
aapke ghar mein abb anyaay aur hathh kaa prakop hoe rahaa haye
jinco badon kaa aadar-sammaan karna chaahiye, way unake sir chadhate hain
main doosare kaa naukar thahara, ghar parr rahata naheen
yahaan merey peechhe striyon parr khadaauun aur jooton kii bauchhaaren hoti hain
kadee baat taka chinta naheen
koee aeka kii dou kaha leey, vahan taka main saha sakata huun kintu yeh kadaapi naheen hoe sakata kii merey oopar laat-ghoonse padein aur main dumm naan maruun
shreekanth-itna main jaanata huun, aapke aashirvaad seey aisaa moorkh naheen huun

aap swayam jaanate hain kii merey hii samajhaane-bujhaane seey, issie gaanv mein kaee ghar sambhal gaye, parr jiss stree kii maan-pratishtha kaa ishwar key darbar mein uttardaata huun, usake prati aisaa ghor anyaay aur pashuvat vyavhaar mujhe asahya haye
aap sach maaniye, merey liye yahee kuchh cumm naheen haye kii lalbihari koo kuchh dund naheen detaa
abb benimadhav sinh bhee garmaaye
aisee baatein aur naan suna sakey
usase jaba kabhi bhool-chook hoe, usake kaana pakado lekin ... shreekanth-lalbihari koo main abb apana bhaai naheen samajhata
benimadhav sinh-stree key peechhe
shreekanth-jee naheen, usaki krurta aur avivek key kaaran
gaanv mein kuchh aise kutil manushya bhee they, joe iss kull kii nitipurna gati parr munn hii munn jalate they
way kahaa karate they-shreekanth apane baap seey dabata haye, isiliye vaha dabbu haye
usane vidya padhee, isaliye vaha kitaabon kaa keedaa haye
benimadhav sinh usaki salah key binaa koee kaam naheen karate, yeh unaki moorkhata haye
bolaa-lalbihari key saath abb iss ghar mein naheen raha sakata
shreekanth-usaki iss dushtata koo main kadaapi naheen saha sakata
yaa tou vahee ghar mein rahega, yaa main hii
aapako yadi vaha adhik pyaara haye, tou mujhe vidaa keejiye, main apana bhaar aap sambhaal luungaa
yadi mujhe rakhna chaahate hain tou usase kahiye, jahaan chaahe chalaa jaaye
buss yeh meraa antim nishchay haye
jiss samay lalbihari sinh sir jhukaaye anandi key dwaar parr khadaa thaa, usee samay shreekanth sinh bhee aankhen laal kiye baahar seey aaye
bhaai koo khadaa dekhaa, tou ghrina seey aankhen fair leen, aur katra curr nickle gaye
maano usaki parchhaain seey door bhaagate houn
vaha munn mein apane pati parr jhunjhala rahee thee kii yeh itane garam kyon hotey hain
shreekanth-tou main kyaa karuun
shreekanth-main naan bulaaunga
ghar key aur loga chaahe manaa karein

unake saath shayanagar mein jaate hii uska mukh vikrit hoe jaataa, bhaunhen tunn jaatin, maathe parr bull parh jaate, shareer agni kii bhaanti jalane lagata, palaken khuli raha jaatin, netron seey jwala-see nikalane lagati aur usamen seey jhulasati hui lapaten nikalatin, mukh parr kalima chhaa jaati aur yadyapi swaroop mein koee vishesh antar naan dikhaayi detaa, parr naan jaane kyon bhram honey lagata, yeh koee nagin haye
apane kamare mein jaa curr kissie aushadhi kii aeka khuraak pee aur pistaul tathaa saanga laker phir tilottama key kamare mein pahunche
vishvaas hoe gayaa kii yeh vahee meraa purana shatru haye
itane dinon mein toh lagaata huaa yahaan aaa pahuncha
usake nayanon seey jwala nickle rahee thee
jisaki aanch dou gaj taka lagati
iss samay unmaad atishay prachand thaa
dayaram koo dekhate hii bijli kii tarah una parr toot padee aur haathon seey aaghaat karane key badale unhein daanton seey kaatane kii cheshta karane luggy
isake saath hii apane donon haath unaki gardan mein daal diye

dayaram ney bahutera chaaha, aidee-choti taka kaa jore lagaaya kii apana galaa chhudaa lein, lekin tilottama kaa bahupash pratikshan saanp kii kedli kii bhaanti kathor aivam sankuchit hotaa jaataa thaa
way issie hais-bais mein padey hue they kii unakaa dumm ghutane lagaa
sahasa tilottama ney unake baanhon kii or munh badhaaya
tilottama baar-baar saanpon kii bhaanti phunkaar maar curr jeebh nikaale hue unaki or jhapatati thee
ekaek vaha badey karkash swar seey bollie-'moorkh
teraa itna saahas kii tuu iss sundari seey premalingan karey
yeh kaha curr vaha badey wegg seey kaatane koo daudi
unhone dahina haath seedha kiyaa aur tilottama kii chhaati parr pistaul chalaa diyaa
usaki baanhen aur bhee kadee hoe gayeen
aankhon seey chingaariyaan nikalane lageen
dayaram ney doosari goli daag dee
aeka member ney kahaa-merey vichaar mein tou inn jaaton mein panchayaton koo phir sanbhaalana chaahiye
idhar hamari laparwahi seey unaki panchaayaten nirjeev hoe gayee hain
isake siva mujhe tou aur koee upaay naheen soojhata
una mahaashay ney jaley hue shabdon mein uttar diyaa-humm logon koo kaanton mein ghaseetana chaahati hain, aur kuchh naheen
vaha bechari kyaa picketing karengi
ducan key saamane khadaa taka tou huaa naan jaayega
missage saxena ney vyangya-bhaav seey kahaa-tou kyaa aapka vichaar haye kii koee aisaa jamaana bhee aayega, jaba sharabi loga vinay aur sheel key putale bunn jaayenge
missage saxena ney germ hocker kahaa-aapke haathon hinsa honey kaa darr aur bhee jyada haye

chaudhari ney tou koee jawab naan diyaa, lekin usake saathi ney joe kaalaa, motaa, badee-badee moonchhonvaala aadami thaa, saral aapatti key bhaav seey kahaa-aggar peena buraa haye, tou angarez kyon peete hain
sub inspector ney onth chabaa curr kahaa-main aapse kahata huun, yahaan seey chaley jaaie, varna mujhe jaabate kii kaarravaai karni padegi
akadate hue ducan parr gaye aur kursi parr paanv rakh curr boley-yeye loga tou maananevaale naheen hain
aeka thigane, kaale aadami ney joe kissie angarez kaa khansama maloom hotaa thaa, laal-laal aankhen nikaal curr kahaa-humm peete hain tumse matlab
tumse bheekh maangane tou naheen jaate
khansama ney jaise kaat khaane key liye daant tej curr liye aur bolaa-bottle kyon patak duun, paise naheen diye hain
khansama ney chaudhari kii or tiraskar key bhaav seey dekhaa, jaise kaha rahaa hoe-kyaa tum samajhate hoe kii main hii manushya huun, yeh sub pashu hain
phir bolaa-tumse kyaa matlab haye jee, kyon beach mein koode padate hoe
tum kaun hotey hoe beach mein bolnewale
main tumhari tarah naheen huun kii bottle patak curr vaah-vaah karaauun
cull phir munh mein kalikh lagaauun, ghar parr mangvaa curr peeuun
khansama ney uddandata seey kahaa-haan-haan, kahata huun tum aaoge aur budd curr aaoge
kaho, pakke kagaj parr likh duun
yeh kahate hue usane jaa curr bottle patak dee aur bolaa-abb aggar tum iss ducan parr dekhana, tou munh mein kalikh lagaa denaa
theekedaar ney ducan key neeche utar curr kahaa-tum loga apani-apani ducan parr kyon naheen jaate jee
main tou kissie kii ducan parr naheen jaataa
aeka darshak ney kahaa-khade hain, tou tumse matlab
sadak tumhari naheen haye
tum garibon koo loote jaao
kissie key baal-bachche bhookhon marein tumhara kyaa bigadata haye
aeka manchale aadami ney jaa curr usa bottle koo uthaa liyaa, joe unake beach mein rakhee hui thee aur usey patakana chaahata thaa kii chaaron sharabi uthh khade hue aur usey peetane lagey
jairam aur usake swayamsevak turant vahan pahunch gaye aur usey bachaane kii cheshta karane lagey kii chaaron usey chhod curr jairam kii taraf lapake
darshakon ney dekhaa kii jairam parr maar padaa chaahati haye, tou kaee aadami jhalla curr una chaaron sharabiyon parr toot padey
laatein, ghoonse aur dundey chalaane lagey
donon haath failaaye una chaaron key vaaron seey butch rahaa thaa
jaba taka doctor yeh naan kaha dega kii abb aap vahan jaane key yogya hain, aapako naan jaane doongi
kissie tarah naheen
tou main bhee aapako naan jaane doongaa
missage saxena ney mridu-vyangya key saath kahaa-aap bhee anya purushon hii kii bhaanti swarth key putale hain
sadaa yash khud lootana chaahate hain, auraton koo koee mauka naheen denaa chaahate
cumm seey cumm yeh tou dekh leejiye kii main bhee kuchh curr sakati huun yaa naheen
ise sherm bhee naheen aatee
stree ney uska raasta roque liyaa-kahati huun, tumhara jee achchha naheen haye, mutt jaao, kyon merrie zaan key graahak hue hoe
usaki deh mein heere naheen jadey hain, joe vahan koee noch legaa
chammu ney jall curr kahaa-yeh kyon naheen kahate kii koee aur hii cheej kheenche liye jaati haye
dukaandaar ney prativaad kiyaa-naheen baabu jee, vaha sub chhante hue gunde hain
main tou unhein apani ducan key saamane khadaa bhee naheen honey detaa
chaaron teen-teen saal kaat aaye hain

dandaa uthaaya aur laal-laal aankhen nikaale bijli kii tarah kaundh curr sharabkhane key saamane jaa pahuncha aur missage saxena kaa haath pakad curr peechhe hataata huaa sharabiyon seey bolaa-aggar tum logon ney deviyon key saath jaraa bhee gustakhi kii, tou tumhare huck mein achchha naan hoga
cull maine tum logon kii zaan bachaayi thee aaj issie dundey seey tumhari khopadi toda curr rakh doongaa
way kuchh kahana chaahate they kii missage saxena ney gambhir bhaav seey poochha-aap yahaan kyon aaye
maine tou aapse kahaa thaa, apani jagah seey naan hiliyega
maine tou aapse madad naan maangi thee
missage saxena ney teekhe swar mein kahaa-aapke vichaar mein duniya key saare kaam maradon key liye hain
missage saxena-tou aap jaa curr aaraam seey letein aur mujhe apana kaam karane dein
missage saxena ney kathor swar mein kahaa-jee naheen, aap jaayen
jairam ney aeka saath hii namr aur kathor hocker poochha-phir koee chhedchhaad hui
jairam nispand baithaa rahaa
jairam unmaad kii dashaa mein vahan seey uthaa aur daudata huaa sharabkhane key saamane aayaa
jairam ney usey dekhate hii lapak curr usaki gardan pakad lii aur itane jore seey dabaayi kii usaki aankhen baahar nickle aayeen
maloom hotaa thaa, usake haath faulad key hoe gaye hain
sahasa missage saxena ney aakar uska fauladi haath pakad liyaa aur bhavein sikod curr bolin-chhod dou isaki gardan
kyaa isaki zaan leey loge
jairam ney aur jore seey usaki gardan dabaayi aur bolaa-haan, leey luungaa
aise dusht kii yahee sajaa haye
missage saxena ney adhikaar-garv seey gardan uthaa curr kahaa-aapako yahaan aaney kaa koee adhikaar naheen haye
aeka darshak ney kahaa-aisaa dabaao baabu jee, kii saalaa thandaa hoe jaaye
hamein tou bolane kaa hukm naheen haye, naheen tou huddy toda curr rakh dete
phir ekaek kathor hoe curr bolin-jaba taka congress ney iss kaam kaa bhaar mujh parr rakhaa haye, aapako merey beach mein bolane kaa koee huck naheen haye
aap meraa apamaan curr rahey hain
congress kameti key saamane aapako iska jawab denaa hoga
jairam tilmila uthaa
binaa koee jawab diye laut padaa
usey phir kuchh sudh naan rahee
khoon kii vaha chingaariyaan jaise usake rome-rome mein samaa gayeen
uska khoon khaulane lagaa, maano usake sir khoon savaar hoe gayaa hoe
vaha una chaaron sharabiyon parr toot padaa aur poore jore key saath lakadi chalaane lagaa
aeka-aeka buund kii jagah vaha aeka-aeka ghadaa khoon bahaa denaa chaahata thaa
vaha poore jore seey lakadi chalaa rahaa thaa
dukaandaar ney zaan-boojhakar merey saath dhokhebaji kaa vyavhaar kiyaa
aeka seb sadaa huaa hotaa, tou main usako kshama key yogya samajhata
sochata, usaki nigah naan padee hogi
mugger chaar-key-chaaron kharaab nickle jaaen, yeh tou saaf dhokha haye
raay-hujur, humm loga madira haath seey bhee naheen chhoote
hamaare shaastron mein isako chhoona paap kahaa gayaa haye
raay-naheen, dharmavtar, madira koo hamaare yahaan varjit kiyaa gayaa haye
raay saahab ney munh fair liyaa aur aankhen bund karke donon haathon seey saahab kaa haath hataane lagey
raay saahab koo abb krodh aaa gayaa
saahab khaatir seey sub kuchh curr sakate they
jaraa kathor swar mein boley-hujur, humm vaishnav hain
maare avesh mein kanthaavarodh hoe gayaa
tou bung peene seey pandit aur devta loga kaa akal kaise khapt naheen hoga, yeh humm naheen samajh sakata
adhyaapikaaen aksar sadharan-see baaton parr shikaayaten karane lagati hain, kabhi-kabhi rooth jaati hain aur sevashram seey vidaa hoe jaanaa chaahati hain

aggar dhoban ney kapade kharaab dhoye yaa kaharin ney unaki saadi mein daagh daal diye yaa chaukidar ney unake kutte koo dutkaar diyaa, yaa unake kamare mein jhaadoo naheen luggy, yaa gwale ney doodh mein paani milaa diyaa, tou isamen sevashram key adhikaariyon kaa kyaa dosh
mugger inhin baaton parr yahaan rona-gaanaa mutch jaataa haye, duniya sir parr uthaa lii jaati haye
kyaa isase yeh siddh naheen hotaa kii vaha kapati yaa kier haye
auron seey vaha kitna khulkar milata haye, kitni hamdardi seey pesh aataa haye, tou manjula seey vaha kyon door-door rahata haye
kyon usase oopari munn seey baatein kartaa haye
vaha pahale dinn kaa nishkapat vyavhaar kahaan gayaa
kyaa vaha yeh dikhaana chaahata haye kii manjula kii usey bilkul parwa naheen haye yaa usase kewal isaliye naraj haye kii dhaniyon kii chaukhat parr sir naheen jhukaati
yeh khushamad usey mubarak rahey
manjula seva karegi
usake iss naye vyavhaar koo manjula apana apamaan samajhati haye
manjula ney aadrr hocker kahaa-tou main chully jaauun
khanna ney vimal koo jalati hui aankhon seey dekhaa aur akadata huaa andar chalaa gayaa
jiss aadami ney meraa apamaan kiyaa, gully-gully meraa naam bechata fira, usey tum munh lagaati hoe, kyaa yeh uchit haye
buss, yaa zaan logee
tuu mujhe thodaa sankhiya kyon naheen dey detee
haan, main tou hatyarin huun hii
abb aur kaise kahogi, kyaa dhol bajaakar
main hatyarin huun, madmati huun, deeda-diler huun, tum sarvagunagari hoe, seetaa hoe, savitri hoe
tum kaun hoti hoe mujhase jawab-talab karnewali
tumse tou main naheen poochhane jaati
mubarak hoe, merrie aankhon kaa sanichar naan door hoga
isaliye kii vaha shaitan tumhare saath bhee vahee dagaa karega, joe usane merey saath kiyaa aur phir tumhare vishay mein bhee vaisi hii baatein kahata firega
main iss dashaa mein aapako chhod curr naan jaaoongi
una logon key jee mein joe aaye, karein
yahaan koee unakaa dabail baithaa huaa haye
binni -'aap fatkaar kyon naheen dete
vindhaye.-' aii hutto ammaan, gaali detee hoe
pujari, 'cassie besamajhi kii baat karati haye ray, kuchh pagali tou naheen hoe gayee haye
iss parr vahee bhakt mahodaya, joe abb stuti samaapt curr chuke they, dapatkar boley, 'maar key bhagaa dou chudail koo
bharbhasht karane aayee haye, fenk dou thaali-vaali
doosare bhakt mahaashay boley, 'abb bechaare thakur jee koo bhee chamaron key haath kaa bhojan karna padegaa
abb paralay honey mein kuchh kasar naheen haye
chidhkar boley, 'kyon ray, tuu abhee taka khadee haye
vaha mujhase leey low
pujari ney kahaa, 'abb unnerth hoe gayaa
sukhiya mandir mein jaa curr thakur jee koo bhrasht curr aayee
daant peeskar bollie, ' papio, merey bachche key praan leey curr door kyon khade hoe
mujhe bhee kyon naheen usee key saath maar daalate
merey chhoo lene seey thakur jee koo chhoot lugg gayee
paras koo chhoo curr loha sonaa hoe jaataa haye, paras loha naheen hoe sakata
merey chhoone seey thakur jee apavitra hoe jaayenge

hamesha key liye

aeka boodhaa khurrat, jiska pesha himalaya kii pariyon koo fansaakar raajaon koo lootana thaa aur joe issie peshe kii badaulat rajdarbaron mein pooja jaataa thaa,iss vibhaag kaa adhayaksh banaa diyaa gayaa
haan, oopar seey bahut achchha aadami haye, lekin andar seey pakka pishach
maine kahala bheja, isamen koee haani naheen, main tawan dene koo taiyar huun, lekin vaha dusht barabar incar kiye jaataa haye
tyoriyaan chadhaakar boley tou aap chaahate hain, 'main usey kidnap karuun
mii. mehta ney aur bhee uttejit hocker kahaa, 'mujhase aisaa pajipan naheen hoe sakata haye
apane swami kii aagya kaa paalan karna pajipan haye
joe aagya neeti aur dharm key viruddh hoe uska paalan karna beshak pajipan haye
