yeh balatkar haye
aap apane hosh mein hain
khoob achchi tarah
main aapako dhool mein milaa sakata huun
tou aapaki gaddi bhee salamat naan rahegi
merrie nekiyon kaa yahee badala haye, namakaharam
aap abb shishtata kii seema seey aage badhe jaa rahey hain, raaja saahab
maine abb taka apani aatma kii hatyaa kii haye aur aapke harr aeka jaa aur beja hukm kii tamil kii haye, lekin atmaseva kii bhee aeka hudd hoti haye, jisake aage koee bhalaa aadami naheen jaa sakata
aapka yeh kritya jaghanya haye aur isamen joe vyakti aapka sahaayak hoe, vaha issie yogya haye kii usaki gardan kaat lii jaay
main aisee naukari parr laanat bhejata huun
binaa soche samajhe usane pahale seey bhee baan hathaun liyaa aur dey danaa-dunn usa patthar parr vaar karane lagaa.
” haye bhagwan, kaise aadami seey merrie shaadi karwa dee joe mujhe aeka chhaata taka khareed curr naheen dey sakata.”
” arey bhaai, aggar tum koee majaak curr rahey hoe tou aisaa majaak mujhe pasand naheen, chalo hutto, mujhe khet jotane dou.”
” aeka mauka milaa thaa apane jeevan koo sudhaarne kaa aur tumane voe bhee haath seey nikaal diyaa.
maanga bhee tou kyaa sirf khet kii hariyali aur fasal kaa mahanga daam.
haye raam, kahaan seey iss mund buddhi key saath meraa vivaah karwa diyaa.” aur saaree raat rotee kosati rahee kanhaiya koo.
arey, maangna hii thaa tou dhana, daulat, haveli maangate taaki baaki kii jindagi shaano shaukat seey gujarati.
mugger apane tunak mijaz koo kaise shaant curr sakati thee ” kyaa teesare vardan mein buss itna saa hii paisa maanga haye kyaa.”
lekin jiddi aur lalchi geetaa tou pahale hii sub soch chuki thee.

samajhaane kaa assar naan hotaa dekh jinn ney geetaa seey phir aeka aakhiri baar sochane koo kahaa tou geetaa kaa paaraa chachay gayaa ”aggar vardan puuraa naheen curr sakate tou vardan diyaa hii kyuun.
maine soch liyaa haye mujhe tou makaan hii chaahiye.”
itani vaibhavata dekh kuchh samay key liye voe kanhaiya taka koo bhool gayee.
usane teesara vardan apani lalchi patni koo dey curr apane pair parr khud hii kulhani maar lii thee.
voe lakhaaya kyaa, buss suresh ney aeka bawal saa khaan curr diyaa. suresh iss mauke koo haath seey naheen jaane denaa chaahata thaa.
lekin suresh kahaan maanane vaalaa thaa.
dauaan huaa ghar gayaa aur betty seey puchhaa kii yeye kyaa tamasha haye.
arey, kitane dair seey main chilla rahaa huun kii aaa rahaa huun, lekin tum chillana bund karo tou sunai pataan naa.
” arey paglo, aggar iss nahar koo paar curr lete tou jangal seey baahar nickle aatey. ”
chilla key bolaa ” merrie kaar kisane toyin.”
dill tou soney koo naheen thaa parr lagata thaa jaise shareer aaraam maangata thaa.
kyonki main teree tarah moorkh naheen huun
"iss vyaapaari kii yeh majaal kii vaha raani key saath durvyavahaar karey"
“haye bhagwan, hamara raaja tou aisaa moorkh haye kii vaha gusalkhane mein kheere khaata haye”
moorkh sevak, tumhari aisee bolane kii himmat kaise hui
tum aggar merey kaksh key sevak naan hotey tou tumhen naukari seey nikaal detaa
usee paid key khokhale taney mein kaheen seey aakar aeka dusht sarp rahane lagaa
tou kyaa harr varsh merey bachche saamp kaa bhojan banate rahenge
dekho, dekho vaha rajkumari kaa haar uthaakar leey jaa rahaa hain
vaha chillaya 'peechhe hutto
ander aeka naag hain
‘‘kyaa baat haye? tum sub yahaan kyon aaa rahey hoe
lekin yaad rakhna, aggar kissie bhee dinn tumane merey khaane key liye puuraa bhojan naheen bheja tou main jitane janwar chahunga, maar dalunga"
aur garajkar bolaa, ‘‘kisane tumhen bheja haye
aeka tou piddi jaise hoe, doosare itani dair seey aaa rahey hoe
jinn bevakoofon ney tumhen bheja haye main una sabako thheek karunga
aeka-aeka kaa kaam tamaam naan kiyaa tou meraa naam bhee shher nahee”
yeh sunate hii shher dahadkar bolaa,
‘‘kyaa kahaa doosara shher
kaun haye vaha
tumane usey kahaan dekhaa’’
parr maine usase kahaa, ‘sarkaar, aapako pataa naheen kii aapane kyaa andher curr diyaa haye
humm sub apane maharaj key bhojan key liye jaa rahey they, lekin aapane unakaa saaraa khaana khaa liyaa haye
hamaare maharaj aisee baatein sahan naheen karenge
way zaroor hii yahaan aakar aapako maar daalenge’’
iss parr usane poochha, ‘kaun haye tumhara raaja’
maine jawab diyaa, ‘hamara raaja jangal kaa sabse badaa shher haye’
‘‘maharaj, ‘merey aisaa kahate hii vaha gusse seey laal-peela hocker bolaa bevakoof iss jangal kaa raaja sirf main huun
yahaan sub janwar merrie praja hain
main unake saath jaisa chaahun vaisa curr sakata huun
jiss moorkh koo tum apana raaja kahate hoe usa chor koo merey saamane hajir karo
main usey bataaunga kii asli raaja kaun haye’
‘‘mujhe fauran usa moorkh kaa pataa bataao’’, shher ney dahadkar kahaa, ‘‘jaba taka main usey zaan seey naan maar doongaa mujhe chain naheen milega’’
aggar main aur badaa aur mazaboot hotaa tou main khud hii usake tukade-tukade curr detaa’’
aur bolaa, ‘‘maharaj, vaha dusht shher zameen key neeche kille mein rahata haye
‘‘main usase nipat luungaa,’’ shher ney kahaa, ‘‘tum yeh bataao kii vaha haye kahaan’’
unhone doosare dinn sabhi adhyapakon koo bulaaya aur kahaa, “mujhe una vidyarthiyon key naamon kii soochi chaahiye joe samaroh key dinn anupasthit they"
unhone kathortapurvak kahaa, “maine parason kyaa kahaa thaa"
“taba bahut saare bachche anupasthit kyon they"
“aggar tum loga rashtriya samaroh key prati itane laparwah hoe tou iska matlab yahee haye kii tum logon koo apani matribhoomi seey pyaar naheen haye
agali baar aggar aisaa huaa tou main tum sabke naam school key register seey kaat doongaa"

vaha manu koo gaur seey dekhate hue bollie – “tumhare dimag mein rahate hain, yeh kyaa baat hui
dimag mein rahane seey kyaa hotaa haye
jaba taka unhein coppy mein naheen likhoge taba taka teacher koo kaise pataa chalega”
“parr tum donon koo jaanate hoe kii mujhe sawalon key jawab aatey hain
vaha tou mai jaldbaji mein gadbad curr detaa huun” manu sakpakaate hue bolaa
manu koo una donon parr gussa tou bahut aayaa parr vaha iss vakt apane doston seey ladana naheen chaahata thaa kyonki iss samay uska cricket khelane kaa bahut munn thaa
usane jhunjhalaate hue kahaa – “aapane yeh kyaa banaa diyaa haye
aapako tou isaki recipe itane achche seey aatee haye”
hamesha chhui-muee aur najuk lagane vaali shrimatiyan bhee mahangai key naam parr gusse seey phanphana uthati hain
unaki mutthiyaan bandh jaati hain
sarkaar lalkaar rahee haye, “arey oh behya
besherm
begairat
baahar nickle aaj main tujhe dhool mein milaa doongi"
mahangai bhee kahaan peechhe rahane vaali vaha bhee attahas karati haye “haa..haa..haa..haa..arey chotti
tuu mujhe dhool mein kyaa milaayegi
tuu tou merey aeka hii vaar mein khud mitty mein mill jaayegi"
usa key putra kaa naam aladin thaa joe kuchh kaam-kaaj naheen kartaa thaa sirf khel-kood mein samay bitaata thaa
maataa-pitaa kii baaton kii upeksha curr key savere hii ghar seey nickle jaataa aur apani hii tarah key awara ladakon key saath dinn bhar khelata rahata
vaha pitaa kii aankh bachaa curr dukaan seey bhaag jaataa aur dinn bhar khel-kood mein bitaa curr shaam koo ghar lautata aur maar khaata
jaba vaha usa seey kuchh kaam karane koo kahati tou vaha usa seey gaali-galauj aur jhagada kartaa
aladin chaudah varsh kaa hoe gayaa kintu usa mein bilkul buddhi naan aaee, usey yeh vichaar taka naheen aayaa kii kuchh kamai karke apana aur maan kaa pett paalana usa kaa kartavya haye
yeh bilkul nikamma haye
iss key pitaa ney bahut koshish kii kii yeh kuchh seekh jaae lekin iss ney kuchh naan seekha
jadugar bolaa, aggar main ise haath lagaa paataa tou khud hii uthaa letaa, tum seey uthaane koo kyon kahata
yeh sub mantron kii baat haye, tum naheen samajh sakoge
naheen, pahale chirag dou, phir main tumhen baahar nikaaluunga
jadugar kii samajh mein bhee yeh baat naan aaee aur vaha aladin kii baaton koo usa kii zid samajh curr itna kruddh huaa kii jore seey chillaya,
tuu mujhe chirag naheen detaa tou yaheen chirag koo liye marr jaa
jiss aadami koo tum apana devar samajhe thee aur jisake haath mein tumane mujhe saunpa thaa usa ney merey saath badee dushmani kii aur apani samajh mein mujhe zaan seey maar curr chalaa gayaa thaa
vaha mujh seey jhoothaa sneh dikhaa curr mujh seey apana koee kaam nikalva curr phir merrie hatyaa curr denaa chaahata thaa
yeh suna curr usa kii maan ney jadugar koo bahut gaaliyan deen
kabhi-kabhi mujhe khayaal aataa kii main kambakht itani ladaaka kyon thee
usa umr mein jabaki merrie aur bahanen aashik jamaa curr rahee theen, main apane-paraaye harr ladke aur ladki seey jootam-paijaar mein mashgool thee

khaan ney' dyodhi parr latka daree kaa pardaa jhatak liyaa
vaha bollie, 'main tou rose tumhare paas aaney koo sochati thee kintu aggar tum merrie baat naan maanoge aur apani baat parr adey rahoge tou main naan aaoongi'
usa ney poochha kii tumhin yeh haar betch rahey hoe
merey haan kahane parr usa ney kahaa kii yeh chori kaa maal haye, isiliye sastaa betch rahey hoe
aggar usa seey achchi kahani naan sunai gaee tou tum chaaron kii mrityu nishchit haye
tuu khadee-khadee kyaa dekh rahee haye, yeh bechara saamaan key bhaar seey dabaa jaa rahaa haye
tuu jaldi seey ise ander leey jaa aur iska saamaan utarava
mazdoor yeh sunkar badaa kruddh huaa aur bolaa, 'tum loga kaun badey dharmachari hoe
tum logon ney daadhi-moonchhen mudaakar islam key niyamon kaa ullanghan naheen kiyaa
tumhen merey vyavhaar parr aapatti karane aur mujhe nasihat dene kaa kyaa adhikaar haye'
striyon ney kahaa kii tum loga yeh bekaar kii bahas chhodo aur rung mein bhang naan karo; low khaao-pio
phir usane saafi key haath seey aeka chabuk liyaa aur mazdoor seey kahaa kii aeka kutiya kii janjir ameena key haath mein dey aur doosari koo merey paas leey aaa
khalifa koo aisee zid savaar hui kii usane aise satparamarsh parr kaana naan diyaa aur mantri koo jhidak diyaa kii tum chup raho main subah taka prateeksha naheen curr sakata"
usane sub logon seey poochha kii kyaa tum sub ney mazdoor seey kahaa thaa kii yeh baatein mujhase poochhe
zubaida ney kahaa, 'tum sabhi loga beiman hoe
tum sub ney pratigya kii thee kii yahaan kii kissie baat key baare mein kuchh naan poochhoge aur tum apani utsukta parr bilkul sanyam naan curr sakey
hamane dayaa karke tum sabako raat kaa thikaana diyaa aur tum aeka sadharan-see pratigya naan nibha sakey
abb tumhara satkaar merey liye bilkul aavashyak naheen haye aur tum logon koo apane kiye kaa phal bhugatana chaahiye
inn baaton mein jaraa-saa bhee jhooth huaa tou fauran usaki gardan maaree jaayegi
joe aisaa naan karey tum uska sir udaa dou
abhee tum inn logon key peechhe nangi talvaaren liye khade raho
usane kahaa main tujhe zaan seey naheen maar rahaa huun lekin dund diye bagair naheen chhodoonga, abb meraa jaadoo kaa khel dekh
aeka ney kahaa, abhee latth laa curr iska surr phod detaa huun
doosare ney kahaa, naheen, yeh aise naheen marega, main abhee teer chhodkar inca anta kiye detaa huun
usane kadak curr kahaa, 'yeh kyaa badtamiji haye, tumhen dund kaa bhaya naheen haye'

bandar bhee kaheen likhata haye?'
mujhe dekhkar nakaab daal liyaa aur baap seey bigad curr bollie kii aapako kyaa hoe gayaa haye kii aparichit purush key saamane mujhe munh khole hue bulaa liyaa
badshah ney kahaa, 'tumhare hosh-hawas tou thikaane hain
yahaan kaun mard haye sivaay merey
aur tum hoe kii khud galati parr hoe aur mujhe dosh detee hoe'

teree yeh himmat kii mujhe daraane koo yeh roop rakh curr aayaa haye'

chaudharayan gusse mein jalee cutty sunaa curr maan bete koo bhalaa-buraa kaha curr vahan seey chully jaati hain

grihpravesh samaroh key dauran koee ghatana naa hoe isake liye pakke intejam kiye jaate hain; parr phir bhee kissie naa kissie tarah aag kii chingari chaudharayan key bhavya makaan key paradon mein lugg jaati haye aur dekhate-dekhate raudra roop dhaaraan curr key puuraa makaan jalaa curr khaak curr detee haye
choonki dagdu iss baare mein pahale hii boll chuka thaa isaliye sub usey kaali juban kaa boll uspar toot patein hain aur usey markar gaanv seey nikaal dete hain
rajguru tenaliram key ghoan naa laane kii vajah poochhate haye
rajguru , maharaj krishnadev raay koo kahate haye key tenaliram jhooth boll rahey haye
tenaliram key ghar key peechhe bunny chhoti see ghudsal dekh rajguru kahate haye kii arey moorkh maanav tum iss chhoti kutiya koo ghusal kahate hoe
maharaj krishnadev raay tenaliram koo soney key sikke aur dou maah kaa samay dey dete hain aur shart rakhate hain kii aggar tenaliram aisaa naan curr sakey tou unhe kaanya dund diyaa jaayega
abb loga thoda krodhit hoe uthhe , aur unhone aeka baar phir mullah koo aamantrit kiyaa .
phir kabhi kissie ney mullah koo naheen bulaaya
akbar ney yeh suna curr turant inam dene seey maanaa curr diyaa, aur yeh tark diyaa kii, usee diye kii garmi seey tum paani mein raat bhar khein raha sakey
isaliye tum inam key hadaar naheen
iss tarah dou pahar seey shaam hoe gayee, aur akbar laal peele hoe gaye aur gusse mein boley,
birbal tuu meraa maakan unaa rahaa haye
tujhe samajh naheen aataa
itani door taka aanch naheen pahunchegi, haandi neeche lagaa
donon vyaktiyon kaa kahana thaa kii way hii aam key peyne key asal malik hain aur dusra vyakti jhooth boll rahaa haye
raghav aav dekhta haye naan taav, auran laathi uthataa haye aur peyne kii or bhaagata haye

usaki patni aavaaj lagaati haye, arey khaana tou khaa low phir jaanaa… raghav jawab detaa haye kii… khaana bhaaga naheen jaayega parr hamaare aam key peyne seey aam chori hoe gaye tou vaha vaapas naheen aaenge… itna boll curr raghav dautaan huaa peyne key paas chalaa jaataa haye
pandit gyanchandra ney govindi kii or satrishna netron seey dekh curr kahaa —mujhe aise nirdayi praaniyon seey jaraa bhee sahaanubhooti naheen haye
iss barbarta kii bhee koee hudd haye kii jisake saath teen varsh taka jeevan key sukh bhoge, usey aeka jaraa-see baat parr ghar seey nikaal diyaa
aisee baaton mein koee baat hoti haye
shikayat haye kii kalindi jabaan kii tej haye
teen saal taka jabaan tej naan thee, aaj jabaan kii tej hoe gayee
kuchh naheen, koee doosari chinya najar aayee hogi
usake liye pinjare koo khaali karna aavashyak thaa
buss yeh shikayat nickle aayee
meraa buss chaley, tou aise dushton koo goli maar duun
gyaan. —aise loga samajhaane seey naheen maanate
yeh laat kaa aadami haye, baaton kii usey kyaa parwa

gyaan. —samajh hii mein naheen aataa kii jisake saath itane dinn hanse-boley, jisake prem kii smritiyaan hriday key aeka-aeka anu mein samaayi hui hain, usey darr-darr thokaren khaane koo kaise chhon diyaa
cumm seey cumm itna tou karna chaahiye thaa kii usey kissie surakshit sthaan parr pahuncha dete aur usake nirvaah kaa koee prabandh curr dete
nirdayi ney iss tarah ghar seey nikala, jaise koee kutte koo nikaale
aise baggai kaa kyaa thikaana
joe aadami stree kaa naan huaa, vaha doosare kaa kyaa hoga
soam. —tum logon ney gaanv mein mujhe kaheen munh dikhaane key yogya naheen rakhaa
tiss parr kahati hoe, maine tumhare saath koee burai naheen kii
teen saal seey kalindi koo aashray dey curr merrie aatma koo joe kasht pahunchaaya haye, vaha main hii jaanata huun
teen saal seey main iss fikr mein thaa kii kaise iss apamaan kaa dund duun
abb vaha avsar paa curr usey kissie tarah naheen chhon sakata
gyaanchand ney sunaa, tou kewal muskara diye; parr govindi iss kutil aaghaat koo itani shaanti seey sahan naan curr sakee
kalindi key prati usake mukh seey apriya shabd nickle hii aaye
somdatt ney merey asaamiyon koo bahaka diyaa haye kii lagaan mutt denaa, dekhein kyaa karate hain
govindi — tum asaamiyon key paas kyon naheen jaate
hamaare ghar naan aayein, hamara chhuaa paani naan piyein, yaa hamaare rupaye bhee maar lenge
chandaa —achchha bhaai, naheen maanate, tou tumhin leey chalo
haan, naheen tou
abb vaha iss vriksh kii sharan chhon curr kaheen naan jaayenge, dilli key takht key liye bhee vaha iss ashram koo naan chhonge
madhav chidhaqar bolaa-marna hii tou haye jaldi marr kyon naheen jaati
dekhkar kyaa karuun
‘tuu badaa bedard haye bey
saal-bhar jisake saath sukh-chain seey rahaa, usee key saath itani bevafai’
ghisu ney aaloo nikalkar chheelate hue kahaa-jaakar dekh tou, kyaa dashaa haye usaki
chudail kaa fisad hoga, aur kyaa
yahaan tou ojhaa bhee aeka rupaya maangata haye
poochha-kyaa haye bey ghisua, rotaa kyon haye
jee mein tou aayaa, kaha dein, chala, door hoe yahaan seey
yon tou bulaane seey bhee naheen aataa, aaj jaba garaj padee tou aakar khushamad curr rahaa haye
haramkhor kaheen kaa, badmash
‘kahenge tumhara sir
tuu mujhe aisaa gadhaa samajhata haye
saath saal kyaa duniya mein ghaas khodata rahaa huun
‘kaun dega, bataate kyon naheen
usey dekhate hii merrie vikalata krodh mein badal gayee
main usey maarne lagaa, phir rooth karke alag khaan hoe gayaa
maine saahas karke kahaa —jaao, mutt denaa, main luungaa hii naheen
maine akaka curr kahaa —pahile dikhaa
bigas curr boley —  aaj itani dair kahaan lagaayi
abb thaila leey curr aayaa haye, usey laker kyaa karuun
daak tou chully gayee
bataa, toone itani dair kahaan lagaayi
baabu jee ney kahaa —tujhe shayed abb naukari naheen karni haye
neech haye naan, pett bharaa tou motaa hoe gayaa
jaba bhookhon marane lagega, tou aankhen khulengi
boley —  achchha, thaila rakh dey aur apane ghar kii raah leey
suar, abb daak leey key aayaa haye
teraa kyaa bigenga, jahaan chaahega, majuri curr legaa
maathe tou merey jaayagi, jawab tou mujhase talab hoga
baabu jee , aaj kyon dair kii, iska jawab dey
achchha, raha tou jaao, aaj ghar aatey hain, tou poochhati huun
jaba dekho, merey laken koo maaraa karate hain
harkara hoe curr merey raaja betaa koo maare
aaj hii tou saafaa, ballam, sub chhinvaaye letee huun
maine ghar mein kadam rakhaa hii thaa kii ammaan jee ney dott curr kahaa —kyon ray chor, tuu aataa kahaan leey gayaa thaa
abb chori karna seekhata haye
bataa, kisako aataa dey aayaa, naheen tou teree khaal udhen curr rakh doongi
ammaan , toone aataa naheen nikala
dekh kitna aataa saare aangan mein bikhra paan haye
dill mein kahaa —iss vakt tumhen kazaki parr dayaa aaa gayee haye, joe chaahe dey dalo; lekin main maangata, tou maarne dautin
naan jaaoge tou phir tumse kabhi naan bolenge, haan
